chunks.original_text: 赤松子为昆林仙伯，治南岳山。 王子登为小有天王，治王屋洞天。 孤竹伯夷、叔齐，为九天仆射，治天台。 孔丘为太极上真公，治九疑山。 颜回受书初为明晨侍郎，后为三天司真。 七十二人受名玄洲门徒，二十人不经北郡之门。 项义仙为蓬莱司马。 周公旦为北帝师，治劲草山。 庄周为太玄博士，治荆山。 吴孙权今在荆山。 张天师为三天法师，统御六虚，数侍金阙，为太上股肱，治在庐山，三师同宅。 王方平为上相，治月支国人乌山。 墨翟为太极仙卿，治马迹山。 徐来勒为太极真人，治括苍山，小宫在天台。 陈安世治小台山。 严君平今在峨媚山。 屈原为海伯，统八海。 王弼为丘监。 郭子声为阆风真人。 魏华存夫人治南岳。 裴清灵治四明山。 马明生今在锺山。 阴长生为地肺真人。 孙登为门丘真人。 九华真妃治夏盖山，或在龙山。 王长、赵升二人，受书庐山中正三天都护。 韩众为霍林真人。 琅琊干吉为太虚左掾，侍天府。 三茅真君为保命定录司非监。 空常诀要 此属《回元九道飞行羽经》。 东方岁星阳元宫中真君，名澄澜，字清凝； 夫人名宝容，字飞云。 南方荧惑星洞阳官中皇君，名维停，字散融； 夫人名华瓶，字玄罗。 中央镇星上枢宫中真皇君，名藏睦，字耽延； 夫人名空瑶，字非贤。 西方太白星素明宫中真皇君，名寥凌，字振寻，夫人名飙英，字灵恩。 北方辰星玄斗宫中真皇君，名肇咺，字精源； 夫人名玄华，字龙娥。 金星第一点，讳婴育，字通勃。 金星第二点，讳焕通，字幽元。 金星第三点，讳金生，字浩渟。 金星第四点，讳谷清，字逃迹。 金星第五点，讳浩逃，字去斗。 土星第一点，讳黄光，字元胤。 土星第二点，讳寥电，字卓度。 土星第三点，讳空桢，字霞玄。 土星第四点，讳滕旻，字灵变。 土星第五点，讳内溢，字益征。 火星第一点，讳常阳，字元无。 火星第二点，讳流精，字七转。 火星第三点，讳南皓，字精极。 火星第四点，讳洞生，字征通。 火星第五点，讳季行，字后化。 木星第一点，讳青芒，字上阳。 木星第二点，讳苍元，字长命。 木星第三点，讳碧渊，字洞生。 木星第四点，讳归青，字玉阳。 木星第五点，讳绿台，字明暧。 水星第一点，讳玄通，字子元。 水星第二点，讳日空，字冬冥。 水星第三点，讳隐阳，字勃光。 水星第四点，讳上元，字藏光。 水星第五点，讳终变，字分图。 辅星帝尊，讳常无盆，字玄解子。 弼星帝真，讳空无光，字隐元觉。 九星 第一太星太上官内妃，名空常法坦，字幸正失。 第二元星中元宫内嫔，名空常三来瓮，字罗朱婴。 第三真星真元宫上元丹母，名空常灵延，字冲双兆。 第四纽星纽幽宫中元内妃，名空常七烈，字横单盘。 第五纲星纲神宫斗中大女，名空常郁书，字畴丘兰。 第六纪星纪明宫斗中中女，名空常气精，字抱定陵。 第七关星关会宫斗中少女，名空常勒郁墨，字天凡婌。 第八帝星帝席官斗中高皇左夫人，名空常石启珠，字络茂华。 第九尊星上尊宫高皇右夫人，名空常爱上条，字云育玄。 太极十二君解十二结诀 东方青帝惆梁际，字青平。 南方赤帝长来觉，字南和。 西方白帝彰安华，字西幸。 北方黑帝保成昌，字北伐。 玄一老子林虚夫，字灵时道。
chunks.translated_text:
*Master Redpine* serves as the *Immortal Earl of Kunlin*, governing Mount Nanyue. *Prince Wang Zideng* serves as the *Lesser Heavenly King of Xiaoyou*, governing the Grotto-Heaven of Wangwu. *Bo Yi* and *Shu Qi* of Guzhu serve as the *Chamberlains of the Nine Heavens*, governing Mount Tiantai. *Kong Qiu* serves as the *Supreme Perfected Duke of the Great Ultimate*, governing Mount Jiuyi. *Yan Hui* first received the scriptures as *Attendant of the Radiant Dawn*, later becoming *Controller of Perfection for the Three Heavens*.

Seventy-two disciples received their names as disciples of the *Gate of the Dark Continent*; twenty did not pass through the *Gate of the Northern Prefecture*. *Xiang Yixian* serves as the *Prefect of Penglai*. *Duke Zhou Dan* serves as the *Master of the Northern Thearch*, governing Mount Jingcao. *Zhuang Zhou* serves as the *Erudite of the Great Mystery*, governing Mount Jing. *Sun Quan of Wu* now resides on Mount Jing. *Master Zhang the Celestial Master* serves as the *Dharma Master of the Three Heavens*, governing the Six Voids, frequently attending the *Golden Watchtower* as the *Right Arm of the Most High*, residing on Mount Lu with the Three Masters sharing the same abode. *Wang Fangping* serves as the *Chancellor*, governing Mount Wu among the people of the *Yuezhi Kingdom*. *Mo Di* serves as the *Immortal Minister of the Great Ultimate*, governing Mount Maji. *Xu Laile* serves as the *Perfected of the Great Ultimate*, governing Mount Kuocang, with a lesser palace on Mount Tiantai. *Chen Anshi* governs Mount Xiaotai. *Yan Junping* now resides on Mount Emei. *Qu Yuan* serves as the *Sea Earl*, governing the Eight Seas. *Wang Bi* serves as the *Tomb Inspector*. *Guo Zisheng* serves as the *Perfected of Langfeng*. *Lady Wei Huacun* governs Mount Nanyue. *Pei Qingling* governs Mount Siming. *Ma Mingsheng* now resides on Mount Zhong. *Yin Changsheng* serves as the *Perfected of the Earth’s Lung*. *Sun Deng* serves as the *Perfected of Menqiu*. The *True Consort of Jiuhua* governs Mount Xiagai, or sometimes Mount Long. *Wang Chang* and *Zhao Sheng*, having received the scriptures, serve as the *Rectifiers of the Central Heaven* and *Protectors of the Three Heavens* on Mount Lu.

*Han Zhong* serves as the *Perfected of Huolin*. *Gan Ji of Langye* serves as the *Left Attendant of the Grand Void*, attending the *Celestial Court*. The *Three Mao Lords* serve as the *Overseers of the Bureau of Life-Preservation and Record-Stabilization*. *The Essential Formulae of the Void and Constant* belong to *The Nine Daoist Scriptures of Feathered Flight*.

The *True Lord of the Eastern Year Star’s Yang Primordial Palace* is named *Chenglan*, styled *Qingning*; his consort is named *Baorong*, styled *Feiyun*. The *August Monarch of the Southern Fire Star’s Cavern Yang Palace* is named *Weiting*, styled *Sanrong*; his consort is named *Huaping*, styled *Xuanluo*. The *True August Lord of the Central Saturn’s Upper Pivot Palace* is named *Cangmu*, styled *Danyan*; his consort is named *Kongyao*, styled *Feixian*. The *True August Lord of the Western Venus’ Plain Bright Palace* is named *Liaoling*, styled *Zhenxun*; his consort is named *Biaoying*, styled *Lingen*. The *True August Lord of the Northern Mercury’s Dark Dipper Palace* is named *Zhaoxuan*, styled *Jingyuan*; his consort is named *Xuanhua*, styled *Longe*.

The *First Point of Venus* is named *Yingyu*, styled *Tongbo*. The *Second Point of Venus* is named *Huantong*, styled *Youyuan*. The *Third Point of Venus* is named *Jinsheng*, styled *Haoting*. The *Fourth Point of Venus* is named *Guqing*, styled *Taoji*. The *Fifth Point of Venus* is named *Haotao*, styled *Qudou*.

The *First Point of Saturn* is named *Huangguang*, styled *Yuanyin*. The *Second Point of Saturn* is named *Liaodian*, styled *Zhuodu*. The *Third Point of Saturn* is named *Kongzhen*, styled *Xiaxuan*. The *Fourth Point of Saturn* is named *Tengmin*, styled *Lingbian*. The *Fifth Point of Saturn* is named *Neiyi*, styled *Yizheng*.

The *First Point of Mars* is named *Changyang*, styled *Yuanwu*. The *Second Point of Mars* is named *Liujing*, styled *Qizhuan*. The *Third Point of Mars* is named *Nanhao*, styled *Jingji*. The *Fourth Point of Mars* is named *Dongsheng*, styled *Zhengtong*. The *Fifth Point of Mars* is named *Jixing*, styled *Houhua*.

The *First Point of Jupiter* is named *Qingmang*, styled *Shangyang*. The *Second Point of Jupiter* is named *Cangyuan*, styled *Changming*. The *Third Point of Jupiter* is named *Biyuan*, styled *Dongsheng*. The *Fourth Point of Jupiter* is named *Guiqing*, styled *Yuyang*. The *Fifth Point of Jupiter* is named *Lütai*, styled *Ming’ai*.

The *First Point of Mercury* is named *Xuantong*, styled *Ziyuan*. The *Second Point of Mercury* is named *Rikong*, styled *Dongming*. The *Third Point of Mercury* is named *Yinyang*, styled *Boguang*. The *Fourth Point of Mercury* is named *Shangyuan*, styled *Cangguang*. The *Fifth Point of Mercury* is named *Zhongbian*, styled *Fentu*.

The *Honorable Star of the Assistant Star* is named *Changwupen*, styled *Xuanjiezi*. The *Perfected of the Adjuvant Star* is named *Kongwuguang*, styled *Yinyuanjue*.

The *Nine Stars*:
The *First Great Star*, *Inner Consort of the Supreme Palace*, is named *Kongchang Fatan*, styled *Xing Zhengshi*.
The *Second Primordial Star*, *Inner Concubine of the Middle Primordial Palace*, is named *Kongchang Sanlaiweng*, styled *Luo Zhuying*.
The *Third True Star*, *Cinnabar Mother of the Upper Primordial Palace of the True Primordial*, is named *Kongchang Lingyan*, styled *Chong Shuangzhao*.
The *Fourth Tether Star*, *Inner Consort of the Middle Primordial Palace of the Dark Tether*, is named *Kongchang Qilie*, styled *Heng Danpan*.
The *Fifth Network Star*, *Eldest Maiden of the Dipper in the Network Spirit Palace*, is named *Kongchang Yushu*, styled *Chou Qiulan*.
The *Sixth Chronicle Star*, *Middle Maiden of the Dipper in the Chronicle Bright Palace*, is named *Kongchang Qijing*, styled *Bao Dingling*.
The *Seventh Pass Star*, *Youngest Maiden of the Dipper in the Pass Assembly Palace*, is named *Kongchang Leyumo*, styled *Tian Fanchu*.
The *Eighth Thearch Star*, *Left Consort of the High Thearch in the Thearch’s Seat Palace of the Dipper*, is named *Kongchang Shi Qizhu*, styled *Luomaohua*.
The *Ninth Honored Star*, *Right Consort of the High Thearch in the Supreme Honored Palace*, is named *Kongchang Aishangtiao*, styled *Yunyu Xuan*.

*The Twelve Lords of the Great Ultimate Unravel the Twelve Knot Formulae*:
The *Green Thearch of the East* is named *Chou Liangji*, styled *Qingping*.
The *Red Thearch of the South* is named *Chang Laijue*, styled *Nanhe*.
The *White Thearch of the West* is named *Zhang Anhua*, styled *Xixing*.
The *Black Thearch of the North* is named *Baocheng Chang*, styled *Beifa*.
The *Primordial One, Old Master Lin Xufu*, is styled *Lingshi Dao*.

chunks.original_text: 三素老君牢张上，字神生道。 正一左仙人仲成子，一名帝宾，字四华。 正一右仙人曲文子，一名光坚，字灵和。 太微小童干景精，字会元子，一名三衿交，一名对帝真。 太一尊神务犹收，字归会昌，一名鲜明，一名寄频。 左元英子玄元叔，字合符子，一名元素君，一名神公子。 右白元洞阳君郁灵标，字玄夷纪，一名朱精，一名启成。 中央司命丈人君理初明，字玄度卿，一名神宗，一名灵华。 命门桃君孩道康，字合精延，一名命王，一名胞根。 泥丸天帝君上一赤子玄凝天，字三元先，一名伯无上，一名伯史华。 泥丸天帝卿肇勒精，字中玄生，一名起非，一名常扶。 绛宫心丹田宫中一元丹皇君神运珠，字子南丹，一名生上伯，一名史云拘。 绛宫辅星中一卿中光坚，字四化灵，一名幽车伯，一名董史华。 命门下一黄庭元王始明精，字元阳昌，一名婴儿胎，一名伯史原。 黄庭保镇弼卿归上明，字谷下玄，一名奉申伯，一名承光生。 第一胎中白炁君务玄子，字育尚生。 第二结中青炁君按延昌，字合和婴。 第三节中黑炁君赋来生，字精上门。 第四胞中黄炁君祖明车，字神无极。 第五血中赤炁君混离子，字叔保坚。 第六上玄元父君高同生，字左回明。 第七下玄元母叔火生，字右回光。 太极紫房天皇大帝君逢凌梵，字履昌灵，一名七灵，一名神丈人。 泥丸中有六宫，官中有帝皇太一君，名重冥空，字幽寥无。 修行太丹隐书诀 前篇具载，此不重出。 金书玉字诀 九天王讳 郁单天王姓混，讳。 无量寿天王姓契，讳。 须延天王姓滓，讳。 寂然天王姓泮，讳。 不骄乐天王姓凝，讳。 化应声天王姓晖，讳。 梵宝天王姓精，讳雾云。 梵迦摩夷天王姓玄，讳霐。 波利答和天王姓王，讳灵。 大帝讳泓正。 玉皇讳碧波。 紫虚讳冥珠。 三老讳辉歇。 太公讳无量。 太一讳务犹。 帝君讳凌梵。 左无英讳公子。 右白元讳洞阳。 司命讳理明。 桃君讳孩道康。 九天中魔王姓伏贷，名崇皱。 皇天中魔王姓碑，名破洞。 三天中魔王姓弼，名。 七天中魔王姓晃，名张虎。 五天中魔王姓由与，名玄风。 三天中魔王姓原，名遥冬左，一名禀。 中天中魔王姓天原，名吉罗下。 四天中魔王姓五天。 六天中魔王姓非，名实真上。 人间魔王姓初，名毒宜石，一名明。 东方青天魔王姓斌，名齿成。 南方赤天魔王姓拂，名白肃。 西方白天魔王姓黄赤，名张市。 北方黑天魔王姓徐，名直事。 中央黄天魔王姓门，名波狂。 大枢魂神，天游魂神，天机魄精， 天权魄精，玉衡魄灵，闿阳魄灵， 瑶光太明。 右七星魂魄之名，号曰七元之灵。 太星阳明，元星阴精，真星真人， 纽星玄冥，纲星丹元，纪星北极， 关星天关，帝星人皇元君， 尊星太素元君。 右九星名。 修真秘旨 奔日法 日中赤炁上皇真君，讳将军梁，字高骞爽。 日中青帝圆常无，字照龙韬。 赤帝丹灵峙，字绿虹映。 白帝皓郁将，字回金霞。 黑帝澄溱渟，字玄绿炎。 黄帝寿逸阜，字飙晖像。 月魂精神暧萧台摽。 奔月法 月中黄炁上皇神母，讳曜道支，字正荟条。 月中青帝夫人娥隐珠，字芬艳婴。 赤帝夫人翳逸寥，字婉延虚。 白帝夫人灵素兰，字郁连华。 黑帝夫人结连翘，字渟属金。
chunks.translated_text:
The *Three Primordial Lords of the Pure* are named *Lao Zhangshang*, styled *Shensheng Dao*.
The *Orthodox Unity Left Immortal* is named *Zhong Chengzi*, also called *Dibin*, styled *Sihua*.
The *Orthodox Unity Right Immortal* is named *Qu Wenzi*, also called *Guangjian*, styled *Linghe*.
The *Lesser Lad of the Grand Tenuity* is named *Gan Jingjing*, styled *Huiyuanzi*, also called *Sanjin Jiao* and *Duizhen Zhen*.
The *Supreme Honored Divine of the Great One* is named *Wuyou Shou*, styled *Guihuichang*, also called *Xianming* and *Jipin*.
The *Left Primordial Hero* is named *Xuanyuan Shu*, styled *Hefuzi*, also called *Yuansu Jun* and *Shengongzi*.
The *Right White Primordial Cavern Yang Lord* is named *Yuling Biao*, styled *Xuanyi Ji*, also called *Zhujing* and *Qicheng*.
The *Central Controller of Destiny* is named *Li Chuming*, styled *Xuandu Qing*, also called *Shenzong* and *Linghua*.
The *Destiny Gate Peach Lord* is named *Haidao Kang*, styled *Hejing Yan*, also called *Mingwang* and *Baogen*.
The *Mud-Pill Heavenly Thearch Lord* is named *Shangyi Chizi Xuanning Tian*, styled *Sanyuan Xian*, also called *Bowushang* and *Boshihua*.
The *Mud-Pill Heavenly Thearch Minister* is named *Zhao Lejing*, styled *Zhongxuan Sheng*, also called *Qifei* and *Changfu*.

chunks.original_text: 黄帝夫人清营襟，字艮定容。 日魂精神珠景赤童。 五星法 岁星上真青黄道君，讳澄澜，字清凝； 夫人讳宝容，字飞云。 荧惑星真君，讳维泞，字散融； 夫人讳华瓶，字玄罗。 太白星真皇君，讳寥浚，字振寻； 夫人讳飙英，字灵恩。 辰星真皇道君，讳肇咺，字精原； 夫人讳玄华，字龙娥。 镇星真皇君，讳藏睦，字耽延； 夫人讳空瑶，字非贤。 秘旨 三丹田神名，俱已在前篇具载讫，此不复重出。 青童君讳梵湄。 秘旨 斗中九精大神，名奇纽，字灵纲。 斗中九精大神，名旋度，字素康。 斗中九精大神，名抗萌，字流郁。 上元大神，名奇纽，字灵纲。 中元大神，名旋度，字素康。 下元大神，名抗萌，字流郁。 斗中九精阴灵玉清上妃，名密华，字邻倩。 上清众经诸真圣秘卷之五竟 上清众经诸真圣秘卷之六

chunks.original_text: 秘旨 六甲旬玉女并殊书。 右甲子太玄玉女，名灵珠，字承翼。 右乙丑太玄玉女，名兰修，字青萌。 右丙寅太玄玉女，名定华，字郁陵。 右丁卯太玄玉女，名须台，字馥猷。 右戉辰太玄玉女，名爱淳，字众梨。 右己巳太玄玉女，名四浮，字宁华。 右庚午太玄玉女，名会容，字流南。 右辛未太玄玉女，名澄华，字抱珠。 右壬申太玄玉女，名双皇，字凤文。 右癸酉太玄玉女，名龙婴，字欢生。 右甲子太玄官左灵飞玉女部。 右甲戌黄素玉女，名神元，字非廉。 右乙亥黄素玉女，名紫春，字飞芝。 右丙子黄素玉女，名奇风，字参盈。 右丁丑黄素玉女，名凤环，字郁娥。 右戊寅黄素玉女，名淑英，字上容。 右己卯黄素玉女，名英玄，字羽珠。 右庚辰黄素玉女，名正龄，字香真。 右辛巳黄素玉女，名蔚胜，字雕罗。 右壬午黄素玉女，名琬瓮，字千成。 右癸未黄素玉女，名良营，字娥昌。 右甲戌黄素宫左灵飞玉女部。 右甲申太素玉女，名真元，字琼石。 右乙酉太素玉女，名兰箫，字玉英。 右丙戌太素玉女，名娥玄，字和明。 右丁亥太素玉女，名与房，字绿华。 右戊子太素玉女，名翔峰，字定晖。 右己丑太素玉女，名烟童，字偃珠。 右庚寅太素玉女，名七翰，字灵飞。 右辛卯太素玉女，名肇台，字篇敷。 右壬辰太素玉女，名蔚金，字丹旗。 右癸巳太素玉女，名安夫，字沙风。 右甲申太素宫左灵飞玉女部。 右甲午绛宫玉女，名丹渟，字云龄。 右乙未绛宫玉女，名散阳，字灵华。 右丙申绛宫玉女，名遂精，字玄珠。 右丁酉绛宫玉女，名抱云，字绿开。 右戊戌绛宫玉女，名房宾，字石香。 右己亥绛官玉女，名清英，字南灵。 右庚子绛宫玉女，名灵群，字曲登。 右辛丑绛宫玉女，名南姜，字启清。 右壬寅绛宫玉女，名纷华，字蔚芝。 右癸卯绛宫玉女，名曜英，字西安。 右甲午绛宫右灵飞玉女部。 右甲辰拜精玉女，名龙源，字灵素。 右乙巳拜精玉女，名欢庭，字逸灵。 右丙午拜精玉女，名营芝，字玉生。 右丁未拜精玉女，名招风，字始娥。 右戊申拜精玉女，名夜华，字云婴。 右己酉拜精玉女，名密明，字胜非。 右庚戌拜精玉女，名紫虚，字容镮。 右辛亥拜精玉女，名凤华，字缘安。 右壬子拜精玉女，名仪房，字上音。 右癸丑拜精玉女，名宝华，字素明。 右甲辰拜精宫右灵飞玉女部。 右甲寅青要玉女，名启元，字惠精。 右乙卯青要玉女，名庆翔，字娥生。 右丙辰青要玉女，名幽昌，字晨晖。 右丁已青要玉女，名伏华，字广敷。 右戊午青要玉女，名绿云，字安君。 右己未青要玉女，名金声，字曲素。 右庚申青要玉女，名飙游，字云飞。 右辛酉青要玉女，名亲贤，字高英。 右壬戌青要玉女，名神珠，字贯众。 右癸亥青要玉女，名云徊，字抱生。 右甲寅青要宫右灵飞玉女部。 两手童子 左名接生，右名方盈， 左龙名飙精，右龙名欻亭。 上部八景神名 脑神名觉无子，字道都。 发神名玄文华，字道衡。 皮肤神名通众仲，字道连。 目神名虚监生、字道童。 顶髓神名灵谟盖，字道周。 膂神名益历辅，字道柱。 鼻神名冲龙玉，字道微。 舌神名始梁峙，字道岐。 中部八景神名 喉神名百流放，字道通。 肺神名素灵生，字道平。 心神名焕阳昌，字道明。

chunks.original_text: 肝神名开君童，字道青。 胆神名龙德拘，字道放。 左肾神名春元直，字道卿。 右肾神名象他无，字道生。 脾神名宝元全，字道骞。 下部八景神名 胃神名同来育，字道展。 穷肠中神名兆腾康，字道还。 大小肠中神名蓬送留，字道厨。 胴中神名受厚勃，字道虚。 胸膈神名广瑛宅，字道仲。 两胁神名辟假马，字道成。 左阴左阳神名扶流起，字道圭。 右阴右阳神名苞表明，字道生。 道一内神名道无马，字道极。 秘旨 太上上玄丹霞玉女，讳缠旋，字密真。 左绛台青房大神，名正心，字切方。 右黄阙紫户大神，名平静，字法王。 日在宫左，月在宫右。 左有明童真君，讳玄阳，字少青。 右有明女真官，名微阴，字少元。 中有明镜神君，讳照精，字四明。 三元泥丸 上丹田上元赤子帝君，讳玄凝天，字三元先。 右有帝卿，名肇精，字中玄生。 中丹田绛宫中，左有中元真人，讳神运珠，字子南丹。 右有辅皇卿，讳中光坚，字四化灵。 下丹田左有下元婴儿，讳始明精，字元阳昌。 右有镇弼卿，讳归上明，字谷下玄。 泥丸太一真君，讳规英，字化玄。 太上帝君九真中经内诀 右此真经中，有三部八景神名，已於前篇《修真秘旨》中具载，此不重出。 授度宝秘诀 第一姓宝真，讳清明乞，阳符。 姓炎开，讳浩先，阴符。 第二姓神珠，讳枢户，阳符。 姓宝罗，讳纳灵，阴符。 第三姓得宝，讳长卿，阳符。 姓惠真，讳来生，阴符。 右三检录后阴阳符解大字真文。 上元上真一君，姓旷，讳演明。 上元中真一君，姓炎，讳开兰。 上元下真一君，姓混，讳森行。 中元上真一君，姓同，讳爱兆。 中元中真一君，姓极明，讳逢玉。 中元下真一君，姓的，讳泽伯。 下元上真一君，姓远，讳及嗃。 下元中真一君，姓亮，讳演营。 下元下真一君，姓玄，讳靖云。 右九真，出玉佩金珰结带上九符。 郁单天王姓混，讳。 无量寿天王姓契，讳。 须延天王姓滓，讳。 寂然天王姓泮，讳。 不骄乐天王姓凝，讳。 化应声天王姓晖，讳。 梵宝天王姓精，讳雾云。 梵迦摩夷天王姓玄，讳霐。 波利答和天王姓王，讳灵。 右九天王姓讳，出太霄琅书结带中符真文。 东方苍帝姓烂，讳开明。 南方赤帝姓洞浮，讳极炎。 中央黄帝姓通班，讳元氏。 西方白帝姓上金，讳昌开。 北方黑帝姓黑节，讳灵会。 右五方五帝姓讳结带后五符真文。 上清众经诸真圣秘卷之六 上清众经诸真圣秘卷之七
chunks.translated_text:
**Spirits of the Liver and Gallbladder:**
The spirit of the liver, named *Kaijuntong*, styled *Daoqing*.
The spirit of the gallbladder, named *Longdeju*, styled *Daofang*.

**Numinous Spirits of the Kidneys:**
The spirit of the left kidney, named *Chunyuanzhi*, styled *Daoqing*.
The spirit of the right kidney, named *Xiangtawu*, styled *Daosheng*.

**Spirit of the Spleen:**
The spirit of the spleen, named *Baoyuanquan*, styled *Daoqian*.

**Names of the Eight Numinous Spirits of the Lower Section:**
The spirit of the stomach, named *Tonglaiyu*, styled *Daozhan*.
The spirit within the intestines, named *Zhaotengkang*, styled *Daohuan*.
The spirit within the large and small intestines, named *Pengsongliu*, styled *Daochu*.
The spirit of the abdomen, named *Shouhoubo*, styled *Daoxu*.
The spirit of the chest and diaphragm, named *Guangyingzhai*, styled *Daozhong*.
The spirits of the two flanks, named *Pijiama*, styled *Daocheng*.
The spirit of the left yin and left yang, named *Fuliuqi*, styled *Daogui*.
The spirit of the right yin and right yang, named *Baobiaoming*, styled *Daosheng*.
The inner spirit of the Unitary Dao, named *Daowuma*, styled *Daoji*.

**Secret Essentials:**
The Supreme Highest Mysterious Cinnabar Rosy Cloud Jade Maiden, whose taboo name is *Chanxuan*, styled *Mizhen*.
The Great Spirit of the Left Crimson Terrace and Azure Chamber, named *Zhengxin*, styled *Qiefang*.
The Great Spirit of the Right Yellow Watchtower and Purple Portal, named *Pingjing*, styled *Fawang*.
The sun resides in the left palace; the moon resides in the right palace.
On the left is the Radiant Youthful Perfected Lord, whose taboo name is *Xuanyang*, styled *Shaoqing*.
On the right is the Radiant Perfected Maiden, named *Weiyin*, styled *Shaoyuan*.
In the center is the Radiant Mirror Spirit Lord, whose taboo name is *Zhaojing*, styled *Siming*.

**Three Primordials of the Mud-Pill Palace:**
**Upper Cinnabar Field:**
The Supreme Emperor Lord of the Upper Primordial, whose taboo name is *Xuanningtian*, styled *Sanyuanxian*.
To his right is the Imperial Minister, named *Zhaojing*, styled *Zhongxuansheng*.

**Middle Cinnabar Field:**
In the Crimson Palace of the Middle Cinnabar Field, on the left is the Perfected of the Middle Primordial, whose taboo name is *Shenyunzhu*, styled *Zinandan*.
To his right is the Assisting August Minister, whose taboo name is *Zhongguangjian*, styled *Sihualing*.

**Lower Cinnabar Field:**
On the left is the Infant of the Lower Primordial, whose taboo name is *Shimingjing*, styled *Yuanyangchang*.
To his right is the Stabilizing Minister, whose taboo name is *Guishangming*, styled *Guxiaxuan*.

The Perfected Lord of the Mud-Pill Supreme Unity, whose taboo name is *Guiying*, styled *Huaxuan*.

**Internal Secrets of the Nine Perfected from the Central Scripture of the Supreme Emperor Lord:**
Within this true scripture, the names of the Three Sections and Eight Numinous Spirits have already been fully recorded in the preceding *Secret Essentials of Cultivating Perfection*; they are not repeated here.

**Precious Secrets of Transmission and Empowerment:**
**First:**
Surname *Baozhen*, taboo name *Qingmingqi*, Yang talisman.
Surname *Yankai*, taboo name *Haoxian*, Yin talisman.

**Second:**
Surname *Shenzhu*, taboo name *Shuhu*, Yang talisman.
Surname *Baoluo*, taboo name *Naling*, Yin talisman.

**Third:**
Surname *Debao*, taboo name *Changqing*, Yang talisman.
Surname *Huizhen*, taboo name *Laisheng*, Yin talisman.

The above three records contain the great characters of the Yin and Yang talismanic explanations.

**Perfected Lords of the Three Primordials:**
The Upper Perfected Lord of the Upper Primordial, surname *Kuang*, taboo name *Yanming*.
The Middle Perfected Lord of the Upper Primordial, surname *Yan*, taboo name *Kailan*.
The Lower Perfected Lord of the Upper Primordial, surname *Hun*, taboo name *Senxing*.
The Upper Perfected Lord of the Middle Primordial, surname *Tong*, taboo name *Aizhao*.
The Middle Perfected Lord of the Middle Primordial, surname *Jiming*, taboo name *Fengyu*.
The Lower Perfected Lord of the Middle Primordial, surname *Di*, taboo name *Zebo*.
The Upper Perfected Lord of the Lower Primordial, surname *Yuan*, taboo name *Jixiao*.
The Middle Perfected Lord of the Lower Primordial, surname *Liang*, taboo name *Yanying*.
The Lower Perfected Lord of the Lower Primordial, surname *Xuan*, taboo name *Jingyun*.

The above Nine Perfected emerge from the nine talismans on the jade pendants and golden seals of the girdle.

**Heavenly Kings of the Nine Heavens:**
The Heavenly King of Yudan, surname *Hun*, taboo name **.
The Heavenly King of Immeasurable Longevity, surname *Qi*, taboo name **.
The Heavenly King of Xuyan, surname *Zi*, taboo name **.
The Heavenly King of Silence, surname *Pan*, taboo name **.
The Heavenly King of Unarrogant Joy, surname *Ning*, taboo name **.
The Heavenly King of Transformative Resonance, surname *Hui*, taboo name **.
The Heavenly King of Brahma’s Treasure, surname *Jing*, taboo name *Wuyun*.
The Heavenly King of Brahma’s Realm, surname *Xuan*, taboo name *霐*.
The Heavenly King of Polidahuo, surname *Wang*, taboo name *Ling*.

The surnames and taboo names of the above Nine Heavenly Kings emerge from the true characters of the talismans in the *Tai Xiao Lang Shu* of the girdle.

**Five Emperors of the Five Directions:**
The Azure Emperor of the East, surname *Lan*, taboo name *Kaiming*.
The Vermilion Emperor of the South, surname *Dongfu*, taboo name *Jiyan*.
The Yellow Emperor of the Center, surname *Tongban*, taboo name *Yuanshi*.
The White Emperor of the West, surname *Shangjin*, taboo name *Changkai*.
The Black Emperor of the North, surname *Heijie*, taboo name *Linghui*.

The surnames and taboo names of the above Five Emperors emerge from the five talismanic true characters on the girdle.

**Scroll Six of the Secret Writings of the Perfected and Sages from the Assemblage of Upper Clarity Scriptures**

chunks.original_text: 黄庭内景诀 发神苍华字太元，脑神精根字泥丸， 眼神明上字英玄，鼻神玉垄字灵坚， 耳神空闲字幽田，舌神通命字正伦， 齿神崿锋字罗千。 右面部七神名。 心神丹元字守灵，肺神皓华字虚成， 肝神龙烟字含明，肾神玄冥字育婴， 脾神常在字魂庭，胆神龙曜字威明。 右六府真神名。 元始谱录太真玉诀 无真讳。 握中诀 岁星真皇君澄澜清凝，夫人宝容飞云。 荧惑星真皇君维渟散融，夫人华瓶玄罗。 太白星真皇君寥凌振寻，夫人飙英灵恩。 辰星真皇君肇咺精源，夫人玄华龙娥。 镇星真皇君藏睦耽延，夫人空瑶非贤。 右五星君、夫人名字。 第一名台光，第二名爽灵，第三名幽精。 右三魂名。 第一名尸狗，第二名伏矢，第三名雀阴，第四名吞贼，第五名非毒，第六名除秽，第七名臭肺。 右七魄名。 第一太星精名玄枢，第二元星精名北台，第三真星精名九极，第四纽星精名旋根，第五纲星精名天平，第六纪星精名命机，第七关星精名玄阳，第八帝星精名高上玉皇，第九尊星精名太微帝君。 右存祝九星名。 握中诀 修明堂玄丹法 日月中央有女子，头巾紫华芙蓉灵冠，朱锦帔裙，自称太玄上玄丹霞玉女，讳缠旋，字密真。 头有九宫，第一明堂宫，左有青房，神名正心，字切方； 右有黄阙，中有紫户，神名平静，字法王。 其七分中，左有明童真君，名玄阳，字少青； 右有明女真官，名微阴，字少元； 中有明镜神君，名照精，字四明。 二寸为洞房宫，左有无英君，右有白元君，中有黄老魂。 三寸为上丹田，号泥丸宫，左有上元赤子帝君，名玄凝天，字三元先； 右有帝君，名肇勒精，字仲玄生。 四寸为流珠宫，有流珠真神，经法未行於世。 五寸为玉帝宫，有玉清神母居之。 明堂上一寸为天庭宫，有上清真女居之。 洞房上一寸为极真宫，有太极帝妃居之。 泥丸上一寸为玄丹宫，有中黄太一真君，名规英，字化玄。 流珠上一寸为太皇宫，有太上君后居之。 凡四宫，名雌一，经法并未传世。 中丹田号绛宫，从心尻尾下一寸，却入三寸许，方一寸，左有绛宫真人，名神运珠，字子南丹； 右有辅卿，名中光坚，字四化灵。 下丹田号命门黄庭宫，对脐却入三寸许，方一寸，左有婴儿，号黄庭元王，名始明精，字元阳昌； 右有弼卿，名归上明，字谷下玄。 黄室中在两乳中间，心上一寸，方一寸，号黄室，有神名黄宁。 握中诀 飞琅牙之华，而方营丘墓者，衍门子、高丘子、洪崖先生是也。 高丘子，道成入玄洲，受书为中岳真人。 衍门子，今在大洞黄金之庭，受书为中元仙卿。 洪崖先生，今为青城真人。 漱龙胎而死决，饮琼精而叩棺者，先师王西城、赵伯玄、刘子先是也。 服金丹而告终，臧延甫、张子房、墨狄子是也。 挹九转而尸臭，吞刀圭而虫流者，司马季主、宁仲君、燕昭、王子晋是也。 周穆王北造昆仑之阿，亲饮绛山石髓，食玉树之宝。 夏禹诣锺山，啖紫柰，醉金液，服灵宝符。 九真、北戎长、胡大王、献帝、舜，以白琅之霜十转紫华。 右此诸君，并已龙奏灵阿，凤鼓云池矣。 而犹尸解托死者，正欲断死生之情，示民有终始之限耳。 岂肯腐骸太阴，以肉饷蝼蚁者哉。 镇神养生内思飞仙上法 常当清斋沐浴，烧香入室，夷心弃累遗尘，豁然无滞，注念不眠，然后真形可睹，游神可还。
chunks.translated_text:
**Yellow Court Inner Radiance Oral Instructions**

The spirit of the hair is *Canghua*, styled *Taiyuan*;
The spirit of the brain is *Jinggen*, styled *Niuwan*;
The spirit of the eyes is *Mingshang*, styled *Yingxuan*;
The spirit of the nose is *Yulong*, styled *Lingjian*;
The spirit of the ears is *Kongxian*, styled *Youtian*;
The spirit of the tongue is *Tongming*, styled *Zhenglun*;
The spirit of the teeth is *Efeng*, styled *Luoqian*.

**Names of the Seven Spirits of the Facial Region**

The spirit of the heart is *Danyuan*, styled *Shouling*;
The spirit of the lungs is *Haohua*, styled *Xucheng*;
The spirit of the liver is *Longyan*, styled *Hanming*;
The spirit of the kidneys is *Xuanming*, styled *Yuying*;
The spirit of the spleen is *Changzai*, styled *Hunting*;
The spirit of the gallbladder is *Longyao*, styled *Weiming*.

**Names of the True Spirits of the Six Palaces**

**Original Register of the Supreme Perfected Jade Instructions of the Primordial Beginning**
Taboo name of the Non-True: *Wu Zhen*.

**Grasping-the-Center Oral Instructions**

The True Sovereign of Jupiter is *Chenglan Qingning*, his Lady is *Baorong Feiyun*.
The True Sovereign of Mars is *Weiting Sanyong*, his Lady is *Huaping Xuanluo*.
The True Sovereign of Venus is *Liaoling Zhenxun*, his Lady is *Biaoying Lingen*.
The True Sovereign of Mercury is *Zhaoxuan Jingyuan*, his Lady is *Xuanhua Long’e*.
The True Sovereign of Saturn is *Cangmu Danyan*, his Lady is *Kongyao Feixian*.

**Names of the Five Star Sovereigns and Their Ladies**

First: *Taiguang*
Second: *Shuangling*
Third: *Youjing*

**Names of the Three Hun**

First: *Shigou*
Second: *Fushi*
Third: *Queyin*
Fourth: *Tunzei*
Fifth: *Feidu*
Sixth: *Chuhui*
Seventh: *Choufei*

**Names of the Seven Po**

First stellar essence: *Xuan Shu*, named *Xuanshu*
Second stellar essence: *Yuan Xing*, named *Beitai*
Third stellar essence: *Zhen Xing*, named *Jiuji*
Fourth stellar essence: *Niu Xing*, named *Xuangen*
Fifth stellar essence: *Gang Xing*, named *Tianping*
Sixth stellar essence: *Ji Xing*, named *Mingji*
Seventh stellar essence: *Guan Xing*, named *Xuanyang*
Eighth stellar essence: *Di Xing*, named *Gaoshang Yuhuang*
Ninth stellar essence: *Zun Xing*, named *Taiwei Di Jun*

**Names of the Nine Stars for Visualization and Invocation**

**Grasping-the-Center Oral Instructions**
**Method of Cultivating the Radiant Elixir of the Bright Hall**

At the center of the sun and moon dwells a woman,
Her head wrapped in a purple-flowered lotus spirit-crown,
Adorned in a vermilion brocade robe and skirt.
She calls herself *Tai Xuan Shang Xuan Dan Xia Yu Nü*,
Taboo name *Chanxuan*, styled *Mizhen*.

Her head contains nine palaces:
The first is the *Bright Hall Palace*;
To the left is the *Green Chamber*, its spirit named *Zhengxin*, styled *Qiefang*;
To the right is the *Yellow Gate*, at its center the *Purple Portal*, its spirit named *Pingjing*, styled *Fawang*.

Within its seven divisions:
To the left is the *Luminous Youth Perfected Lord*, named *Xuanyang*, styled *Shaoqing*;
To the right is the *Luminous Maiden Perfected Official*, named *Weiyin*, styled *Shaoyuan*;
At the center is the *Bright Mirror Spirit Lord*, named *Zhaojing*, styled *Siming*.

Two inches above is the *Cavern Chamber Palace*,
To the left is the *Wu Ying Lord*, to the right the *Bai Yuan Lord*, at the center the *Yellow Elder Soul*.

Three inches above is the *Upper Cinnabar Field*, called the *Mud Pill Palace*,
To the left is the *Upper Prime Red Child Emperor Lord*, named *Xuanning Tian*, styled *Sanyuan Xian*;
To the right is the *Emperor Lord*, named *Zhaole Jing*, styled *Zhong Xuan Sheng*.

Four inches above is the *Flowing Pearl Palace*,
Dwelling the *Flowing Pearl True Spirit*—its scriptural method has not circulated in the world.

Five inches above is the *Jade Emperor Palace*,
Where the *Jade Clarity Spirit Mother* resides.

One inch above the *Bright Hall* is the *Celestial Court Palace*,
Where the *Upper Clarity True Maiden* resides.

One inch above the *Cavern Chamber* is the *Ultimate Perfection Palace*,
Where the *Supreme Ultimate Empress* resides.

One inch above the *Mud Pill* is the *Mysterious Elixir Palace*,
Where the *Central Yellow Great One True Lord*, named *Guiying*, styled *Huaxuan*, resides.

One inch above the *Flowing Pearl* is the *Supreme August Palace*,
Where the *Supreme Lord and Queen* reside.

These four palaces are called the *Feminine One*—their scriptural methods have likewise not been transmitted to the world.

The *Middle Cinnabar Field* is called the *Vermilion Palace*,
Located one inch below the heart’s coccyx, then three inches inward, one inch square.
To the left is the *Vermilion Palace Perfected Person*, named *Shenyun Zhu*, styled *Zinan Dan*;
To the right is the *Assistant Minister*, named *Zhong Guangjian*, styled *Sihua Ling*.

The *Lower Cinnabar Field* is called the *Life Gate Yellow Court Palace*,
Opposite the navel, three inches inward, one inch square.
To the left is the *Infant*, titled *Yellow Court Primordial King*, named *Shiming Jing*, styled *Yuanyang Chang*;
To the right is the *Assistant Minister*, named *Guishang Ming*, styled *Guxia Xuan*.

The *Yellow Chamber* lies between the breasts, one inch above the heart, one inch square.
Called the *Yellow Chamber*, its spirit is named *Huangning*.

**Grasping-the-Center Oral Instructions**

Those who cultivated the blossoms of *Feilangya* and tended the tombs of *Yingqiu*:
*Yanmenzi*, *Gaoqiuzi*, and *Master Hongya*.

*Gaoqiuzi* attained the Dao and entered the *Mysterious Continent*, receiving the scriptures to become the *Perfected of the Central Marchmount*.
*Yanmenzi* now dwells in the *Great Cavern Golden Court*, having received the scriptures to become the *Immortal Minister of the Middle Prime*.
*Master Hongya* is now the *Perfected of Qingcheng*.

Those who rinsed the dragon embryo to master the death-decision and drank jade essence to knock upon their coffins:
Master *Wang Xicheng*, *Zhao Boxuan*, and *Liu Zixian*.

Those who consumed the golden elixir to announce their end:
*Zang Yanfu*, *Zhang Zifang*, and *Mo Dizi*.

Those who ingested the ninefold-transmuted elixir yet reeked of corpses, or swallowed the knife-point and bred worms:
*Sima Jizhu*, *Ning Zhongjun*, *Yan Zhao*, and *Wang Zijin*.

King Mu of Zhou journeyed north to the slopes of Kunlun,
Drinking the cinnabar marrow of *Jiangshan*, eating the treasure of the jade tree.
Yu the Great visited *Zhongshan*,
Tasting purple crabapples, intoxicated by golden liquor, ingesting the talismans of the *Numinous Treasure*.

The *Nine Perfected*, the *Northern Rong Elder*, *King Hu*, the *Offering Emperor*, and *Shun*:
With the frost of white *langya*, they refined it tenfold into purple blossoms.

**All these lords have already ascended on dragons to the numinous slopes, or played flutes on phoenixes by the cloud pools.**

Yet those who feign death through *corpse liberation* do so precisely to sever the emotions of life and death,
Demonstrating to the people that there is a limit to beginning and end.
How could they willingly rot their bones in the *Great Yin*, offering their flesh to ants and mole crickets?

**Inner Contemplation Method for Stabilizing Spirits, Nurturing Life, and Ascending as an Immortal**

Always maintain purity through fasting and bathing,
Burn incense and enter the chamber,
Calm the heart, cast off burdens, and leave the dust behind,
Achieving a state of boundless clarity.
Focus the mind without sleep—
Only then may the true form be seen, and the wandering spirit return.

The surnames and taboo names of the above Five Emperors emerge from the five talismanic true characters on the girdle.

**Scroll Seven of the Secret Writings of the Perfected and Sages from the Assemblage of Upper Clarity Scriptures**

chunks.original_text: 每以平旦，东向平坐，临目内存形色朗然，呼其正讳还镇本宫，叩齿三十六通，乃存： 发神名苍华，字太元，形长二寸一分。 脑神名精根，字泥丸，形长一寸一分。 眼神名明上，字英玄，形长三寸。 鼻神名玉垄，字灵坚，形长二寸五分。 舌神名通命，字正伦，形长七寸。 齿神名崿锋，字罗千，形长一寸五分。 右面神七人，同衣飞罗裙，并婴儿之形。 心神名丹元，字守灵，形长九寸。 肺神名皓华，字虚成，形长八寸。 肝神名龙烟，字含明，形长七寸。 肾神名玄冥，字育婴，形长三寸六分。 脾神名常在，字魂庭，形长七寸三分。 胆神名龙曜，字威明，形长三寸六分。 右六府真神，同着丹锦飞裙，处五脏之内，六府之官，形若婴儿，色如华童。 次思精血三真，名元生君，名黄宁，字子玄，镇人两乳之下源。 骨节二真，名坚玉君，字凝羽珠，镇人太仓之府五肠之口。 心中一真，名天精液君，字飞生上英，镇人胸中四极之口。 九元之真男，名拘制，字三阳，镇人左耳，伏晨之户。 皇一之魂女，名上归，字帝子，镇人右耳，伏晨之户。 紫素左元君，名翳郁无刃，字安来上，镇人头面之境。 黄素中元君，名圆华黄刃，字太张上，镇人胸腹之境。 白素右元君，名启明箫刃，字金门上，镇人下关之境。 日中司命，名接生，镇人左手。 月中桃君，名方盈，镇人右手。 胎中一元白炁君，名务玄子，字育尚生； 太一精魂，名玄归子，字盛昌。 二神镇人五脏之上，经喉之本。 结中青炁君，名案延昌，字合和婴； 元君精魂，名保谷童，字明夫。 二神镇人五脏之下，大胃之上。 节中黑炁君，名斌来生，字精上门； 帝真精魂，名幽台生，字灌上生。 二神镇人九肠之口，伏源之下。 胞中黄炁君，名初明车，字神无极； 天帝精魂，名理维藏，字法珠。 二神镇人小肠之内，二孔之本。 血中赤炁君，名混离子，字叔保坚； 司命精魂，名发纽子，字庆玄。 二神镇人百关之血，绝节之下。 上玄元父君，名高同生，字左回明。 下玄元母，名叔火王，字右回光。 帝皇太一君，名重冥空，字幽寥无。 九帝尊，名日明真，字众帝生。 大帝精魂，名阳堂玉，字八灵。 九关魂，名绿回道，字绝冥。 天纪帝魂，名照无阿，字广神。 右七神，镇人本命之根，塞人死路之门。 太一帝君大回元通仙法 雌一洞房三素高元君者，是太素三元君之子也。 虚豁九霄，洞畅龙玄，散华玉空，苞胎灵津，神气流於明晖，清景秀於液间，三女俱诞，号曰三素元君。 紫素元君，讳翳郁无刃，字安来上，貌少如婴孩，上着虎锦紫华帔，下着紫华龙文裙，头建紫晨芙蓉冠，御紫晨双珠盖，腰带流金火铃，又佩神金、月明二虎符，左手执太上消魔经，右手执金真玉光章。 黄素元君，讳圆华黄刃，字太张上，受生为女子，号曰黄素高元君。 曜形有黄金之质，貌如婴儿之状，上着黄锦云帔，下着黄罗飞华裙，头建紫华芙蓉冠，腰带神金二虎符，左手执流金火铃，右手执大洞真经。 白素元君，讳启明箫刃，字金门上。 是乃凭玄积感，协气幽初，凝宝五道，受胎空虚，而结形为女子，貌常如婴孩之状，上着龙文白锦被，下着白锦华裙，头建紫华芙蓉冠，腰佩神金二虎符，左手执流金火铃，右手执文。
chunks.translated_text:
At each dawn, face east and sit upright. With eyes gently closed, inwardly visualize your form radiant and clear. Call your true name to return and stabilize your original palace. Strike the teeth thirty-six times, then visualize:

The spirit of the hair, named Canghua, styled Taiyuan, two *cun* and one *fen* in height.
The spirit of the brain, named Jinggen, styled Niwan, one *cun* and one *fen* in height.
The spirit of the eyes, named Mingshang, styled Yingxuan, three *cun* in height.
The spirit of the nose, named Yulong, styled Lingjian, two *cun* and five *fen* in height.
The spirit of the tongue, named Tongming, styled Zhenglun, seven *cun* in height.
The spirit of the teeth, named Efeng, styled Luoqian, one *cun* and five *fen* in height.

The seven spirits of the face all wear flying silk skirts, each taking the form of an infant.

The spirit of the heart, named Danyuan, styled Shouling, nine *cun* in height.
The spirit of the lungs, named Haohua, styled Xucheng, eight *cun* in height.
The spirit of the liver, named Longyan, styled Hanming, seven *cun* in height.
The spirit of the kidneys, named Xuanming, styled Yuying, three *cun* and six *fen* in height.
The spirit of the spleen, named Changzai, styled Hunting, seven *cun* and three *fen* in height.
The spirit of the gallbladder, named Longyao, styled Weiming, three *cun* and six *fen* in height.

The true spirits of these six palaces all wear cinnabar brocade flying skirts, dwelling within the five viscera and the six palaces. Their forms resemble infants, their complexion like radiant youths.

Next, visualize the three true spirits of essence and blood, named Yuansheng Jun, styled Huangning, styled Zixuan, stabilizing the source beneath the two breasts.
The two true spirits of the bones and joints, named Jianyu Jun, styled Ningyuzhu, stabilizing the mouth of the five intestines in the storehouse of the Great Granary.
The one true spirit of the heart, named Tianjingye Jun, styled Feisheng Shangying, stabilizing the mouth of the four extremities within the chest.

The true male of the Nine Origins, named Juzhi, styled Sanyang, stabilizing the left ear, the gate of Hidden Dawn.
The soul-female of the August One, named Shanggui, styled Dizi, stabilizing the right ear, the gate of Hidden Dawn.

The Left Primordial Purple Radiance Lord, named Yiyu Wuren, styled Anlai Shang, stabilizing the region of the head and face.
The Central Primordial Yellow Radiance Lord, named Yuanhua Huangren, styled Taizhang Shang, stabilizing the region of the chest and abdomen.
The Right Primordial White Radiance Lord, named Qiming Xiaoren, styled Jinmen Shang, stabilizing the region of the lower barrier.

The Director of Destiny within the sun, named Jiesheng, stabilizing the left hand.
The Peach Lord within the moon, named Fangying, stabilizing the right hand.

The One Primordial White *Qi* Lord of the Womb, named Wuxuanzi, styled Yushangsheng;
The Supreme One’s Essence-Soul, named Xuanguizi, styled Shengchang.
These two spirits stabilize the upper region of the five viscera, the root of the throat.

The Green *Qi* Lord of the Knot, named Anyanchang, styled Heheying;
The Essence-Soul of the Primordial Lord, named Baogutong, styled Mingfu.
These two spirits stabilize the lower region of the five viscera, above the great stomach.

The Black *Qi* Lord of the Joints, named Binlaisheng, styled Jingshangmen;
The Essence-Soul of the Imperial True One, named Youtaisheng, styled Guanshangsheng.
These two spirits stabilize the mouth of the nine intestines, below the hidden source.

The Yellow *Qi* Lord of the Bladder, named Chumingche, styled Shenwuji;
The Essence-Soul of the Heavenly Emperor, named Liweizang, styled Fazhu.
These two spirits stabilize the interior of the small intestine, the root of the two orifices.

The Red *Qi* Lord of the Blood, named Hunlizi, styled Shubaojian;
The Essence-Soul of the Director of Destiny, named Faniuzi, styled Qingxuan.
These two spirits stabilize the blood of the hundred joints, below the severed nodes.

The Upper Primordial Father Lord, named Gaotongsheng, styled Zuohuiming.
The Lower Primordial Mother, named Shuhuowang, styled Youhuiguang.
The Supreme One Lord of the Great August, named Chongmingkong, styled Youliaowu.
The Nine August Honored Ones, named Rimingzhen, styled Zhongdisheng.
The Great Emperor’s Essence-Soul, named Yangtangyu, styled Baling.
The Nine Barriers’ Soul, named Lühuidao, styled Jueming.
The Heavenly Register’s Imperial Soul, named Zhaowua, styled Guangshen.

These seven spirits stabilize the root of one’s original destiny, sealing the gates of the paths of death.

**The Supreme One Lord’s Great Returning Primordial Daoist Method of Transcendent Communication**

The Three Primordial High Lords of the Feminine One’s Grotto-Chamber—namely, the Three Radiant High Lords—are the children of the Three Primordial Lords of the Great Simplicity. They traverse the Nine Empyreans with boundless openness, penetrating the Dragon’s Mystery with unobstructed clarity. They scatter blossoms in the Jade Void, enclose the womb with numinous essence. Their spirit and *qi* flow through luminous radiance, their pure effulgence flourishing amid the subtle fluids. Together, the three maidens were born, styled the Three Primordial Lords.

The Purple Radiance Primordial Lord, named Yiyu Wuren, styled Anlai Shang, appears youthful as an infant. Above, she wears a tiger-brocade purple radiance mantle; below, a purple radiance dragon-patterned skirt. Upon her head rests a purple dawn hibiscus crown, and she is shaded by a purple dawn double-pearl canopy. At her waist hangs a flowing-gold fire bell, and she bears the Divine Gold and Moon Bright tiger talismans. In her left hand, she holds the *Scripture of the Supreme One for Dispelling Demons*; in her right, the *Jade Luminance Chapter of Golden Perfection*.

The Yellow Radiance Primordial Lord, named Yuanhua Huangren, styled Taizhang Shang, was born a woman, styled the Yellow Radiance High Lord. Her luminous form possesses the quality of yellow gold, her countenance like that of an infant. Above, she wears a yellow brocade cloud mantle; below, a yellow silk flying blossom skirt. Upon her head rests a purple radiance hibiscus crown, and at her waist, the Divine Gold tiger talismans. In her left hand, she holds a flowing-gold fire bell; in her right, the *True Scripture of the Great Cavern*.

The White Radiance Primordial Lord, named Qiming Xiaoren, styled Jinmen Shang, was conceived through the accumulation of the Mysterious and the alignment of hidden origins. She condensed the treasures of the Five Paths, received the womb of the empty void, and took form as a woman. Her countenance ever resembles that of an infant. Above, she wears a dragon-patterned white brocade cloak; below, a white brocade blossom skirt. Upon her head rests a purple radiance hibiscus crown, and at her waist, the Divine Gold tiger talismans. In her left hand, she holds a flowing-gold fire bell; in her right, the *Scripture*.
chunks.overlap_context:
How could they willingly rot their bones in the *Great Yin*, offering their flesh to ants and mole crickets?

**Inner Contemplation Method for Stabilizing Spirits, Nurturing Life, and Ascending as an Immortal**

Always maintain purity through fasting and bathing,
Burn incense and enter the chamber,
Calm the heart, cast off burdens, and leave the dust behind,
Achieving a state of boundless clarity.
Focus the mind without sleep—
Only then may the true form be seen, and the wandering spirit return.

chunks.original_text: 太上智慧经 太一讳务犹收。 无英公子讳玄元叔。 白元君讳郁灵标。 命门桃君讳孩道康。 中央司命君讳理初明。 回神飞霄登空招五星上法 右经中有诸星真皇讳，前篇俱已具载，此不重出。 五方帝讳 东方青帝，讳通明，字盖卿，巾青巾，衣青衣，冠青冠，履青履，带通光阳霞之章。 肝中四真君，青明君，字明轮童子。 南方赤帝，讳太阳，字幼林，巾赤巾，衣赤衣，冠赤冠，履赤履，带四玄朱碧之章。 绛宫中一元丹皇君，名神运珠，字子南丹，一名生上伯，一名史云拘。 西方白帝，讳通阴，字元起，巾白巾，衣素衣，冠素冠，履素履，带皓灵扶希之章。 肺中六真，名上元素玉女君，字梁南中童。 北方黑帝，讳通神，字子规，巾苍巾，衣皂衣，冠苍冠，履苍履，带郁真箫凤之章。 肾中七真君，名玄阳君，字冥光先生。 中央黄帝，讳万福，字太仓，巾黄巾，衣黄衣，冠黄冠，履黄履，带中元八维玉门之章。 脾中五真君，名养光君，字太昌子。 上玄元父君，讳高同生，字左回明。 下玄元母，名叔火王，字右回光。 隐书步五星存五星法 东方岁星真皇君，讳澄澜，字清凝，夫人讳宝容，字飞云。 南方荧惑星真皇君，讳维渟，字散融，夫人讳华瓶，字玄罗。 中央镇星真皇君，讳藏睦，字耽延，夫人讳空瑶，字非贤。 西方太白星真皇君，讳寥凌，字振寻，夫人讳飙英，字灵恩。 北方辰星真皇君，讳肇咺，字精源，夫人讳玄华，字龙娥。 度黄庭经仪 右仪中有面部六府真神讳，已在《镇神养生内思飞仙上法》中具载，此不复重出。 金真玉经仪 金明氏，讳七真子，属金相桐明玉国九真卿。 上景金轮里上清朝仪 右仪中有五帝及夫人，并七星之名，九星之名，及内妃等讳，已在《空常诀要》中具载，此不复重出。 元始谱盟百八道君讳 右此卷中有百八道君讳，已在《高上元始玉皇谱录》卷中具载，此不复重出。 太上求仙定录尺素真诀玉文 天皇君，讳阂，四字。 地皇君，讳闸闭，七字。 人皇君，讳阊，五字。 东岳君，讳区更生。 南岳君，讳祝昌中。 中岳君，讳玉精。 西岳君，讳辱曲正。 北岳君，讳玄月丰。 灵宝君姓讳。 武齿成，　佛由肃，　天门波狂， 赫张布，　徐直事。 八景录魔讳 洞真君姓讳（原缺）。 太素阙，讳莹，字元康。 黄素厥，讳林，字大济。 白素厥，讳晃，字虚玄。 甲乙杀鬼都伯史，姓宋，名臣映。 丙丁杀鬼都伯史，姓支筒，名法生。 戊己杀鬼都伯史，姓帛，名西子留，一名庚辛。 庚辛杀鬼都伯史，姓黄。 名安正理，一名戊己。 壬癸杀鬼都伯史，姓郑，名玄丘伯。 源统经目 太元真人大茅君，讳盈。 玄洲上卿苏君，讳林。 清虚真人小有天王，姓王，讳褒。 太上郁仪赤景文 右此卷中有日月内五帝及夫人真讳，已在前篇具载，此不复重出。 日中赤气上皇高真道君。 月中黄气上皇神母。 太上八智慧灭魔神虎隐文 太微天帝君，名 ，字山渊。 六天大鬼，内名辟乾毒王。 北帝魔王，隐讳震拾罗。 北酆鬼相，魂名四天皛。 高圣太上大道君洞真金玄八景玉录 上清高圣太上大道君，字上开元。 苍帝名录丰子。 中微赤帝名定无彦。 紫微白帝名渠渊石。 玄微黑帝名齐元旋。 始微上帝名接空子。
chunks.translated_text:
**The Scripture of Supreme Wisdom**

The Great One’s secret name is Wuyou Shou.
The Unbounded Duke’s secret name is Xuanyuan Shu.
The White Primordial Lord’s secret name is Yuling Biao.
The Peach Lord of the Life Gate’s secret name is Haidao Kang.
The Central Controller of Destiny’s secret name is Lichu Ming.

**Method for Summoning the Five Stars by Ascending the Empyrean and Turning the Spirit**
The secret names of the Perfected Sovereigns of the various stars in this scripture have all been recorded in the preceding section and will not be repeated here.

**The Secret Names of the Five Thearchs of the Directions**
The Azure Thearch of the East, secret name Tongming, styled Gaiqing, wears an azure kerchief, azure robes, an azure crown, azure shoes, and bears the insignia of the Radiant Yang Mist.

Within the liver dwell the Four Perfected Lords, among them the Azure Bright Lord, styled Bright Wheel Lad.

The Vermilion Thearch of the South, secret name Taiyang, styled Youlin, wears a vermilion kerchief, vermilion robes, a vermilion crown, vermilion shoes, and bears the insignia of the Four Mysterious Vermilion Greens.

Within the Crimson Palace dwells the Primordial Cinnabar Sovereign, named Divine Moving Pearl, styled Zinan Dan, also called Ascending Elder and Shiyun Ju.

The White Thearch of the West, secret name Tongyin, styled Yuanqi, wears a white kerchief, plain robes, a plain crown, plain shoes, and bears the insignia of the Luminous Numinous Support.

Within the lungs dwell the Six Perfected, among them the Supreme Primordial Plain Jade Maiden Lord, styled Liangnanzhong Lad.

The Black Thearch of the North, secret name Tongshen, styled Zigui, wears a dark kerchief, black robes, a dark crown, dark shoes, and bears the insignia of the Profound True Flute Phoenix.

Within the kidneys dwell the Seven Perfected Lords, among them the Mysterious Yang Lord, styled Dark Radiance Master.

The Yellow Thearch of the Center, secret name Wanfu, styled Taicang, wears a yellow kerchief, yellow robes, a yellow crown, yellow shoes, and bears the insignia of the Central Primordial Eight Directions Jade Gate.

Within the spleen dwell the Five Perfected Lords, among them the Nourishing Radiance Lord, styled Taichang Lad.

The Supreme Primordial Father Lord, secret name Gaotong Sheng, styled Zuohui Ming.
The Supreme Primordial Mother, named Shuhuo Wang, styled Youhui Guang.

**Concealed Scripture: Method for Pacing the Five Stars and Visualizing Their Presence**
The Perfected Sovereign of Jupiter in the East, secret name Chenglan, styled Qingning; his consort, secret name Baorong, styled Feiyun.
The Perfected Sovereign of Mars in the South, secret name Weiting, styled Sanrong; his consort, secret name Huaping, styled Xuanluo.
The Perfected Sovereign of Saturn in the Center, secret name Cangmu, styled Danyan; his consort, secret name Kongyao, styled Feixian.
The Perfected Sovereign of Venus in the West, secret name Liaoling, styled Zhenxun; his consort, secret name Biaoying, styled Ling’en.
The Perfected Sovereign of Mercury in the North, secret name Zhaoxuan, styled Jingyuan; his consort, secret name Xuanhua, styled Long’e.

**Rites for Reciting the Scripture of the Yellow Court**
The secret names of the Perfected Spirits of the Six Palaces of the face have already been recorded in *The Method for Pacifying the Spirits and Nurturing Life through Inner Contemplation and Ascending as an Immortal* and will not be repeated here.

**Rites of the Golden Perfected and Jade Scripture**
The Gold Bright Clan, secret name Qizhen Zi, belongs to the Golden Phase of the Tongming Jade Kingdom’s Nine Perfected Ministers.

**Supreme Clarity Audience Rites in the Golden Wheel of the Upper Empyrean**
The secret names of the Five Thearchs and their consorts, along with the names of the Seven Stars, the Nine Stars, and the Inner Consorts, have all been recorded in *The Essential Secrets of the Empty Constancy* and will not be repeated here.

**The Register of the One Hundred and Eight Dao Lords from the Alliance of the Primordial Beginning**
The secret names of the One Hundred and Eight Dao Lords in this scroll have already been recorded in *The Jade Register of the Supreme Primordial Jade Thearch* and will not be repeated here.

**The Jade Text of the Pure Writs on Silk for Seeking Immortality and Determining the Register**
The Heavenly Thearch Lord, secret name [four characters: *Kai He Yu Kou*].
The Earthly Thearch Lord, secret name [seven characters: *Zha Wei Bi Yu Kou Meng Kou*].
The Human Thearch Lord, secret name [five characters: *Zhen Meng Chang Yu*].
The Lord of the Eastern Marchmount, secret name Qu Gengsheng.
The Lord of the Southern Marchmount, secret name Zhu Changzhong.
The Lord of the Central Marchmount, secret name Yu Jing.
The Lord of the Western Marchmount, secret name Ru Quzheng.
The Lord of the Northern Marchmount, secret name Xuan Yuefeng.

**The Secret Names of the Eight Radiant Lords for Annihilating Demons**
The Perfected Lord of the Cavern, surname and secret name [originally missing].
The Supreme Simplicity Gate, secret name Ying, styled Yuankang.
The Yellow Simplicity Gate, secret name Lin, styled Daji.
The White Simplicity Gate, secret name Huang, styled Xuxuan.
The Slayer of Ghosts of Jia and Yi, the Capital of the Eastern Marchmount, surname Song, name Chenying.
The Slayer of Ghosts of Bing and Ding, the Capital of the Southern Marchmount, surname Zhi Tong, name Fasheng.
The Slayer of Ghosts of Wu and Ji, the Capital of the Central Marchmount, surname Bo, name Xiziliu, also called Gengxin.
The Slayer of Ghosts of Geng and Xin, the Capital of the Western Marchmount, surname Huang, name An Zhengli, also called Wuji.
The Slayer of Ghosts of Ren and Gui, the Capital of the Northern Marchmount, surname Zheng, name Xuanyu Bo.

**Catalogue of the Source Unifying Scripture**
The Great Mao Lord of the Supreme Primordial, secret name Ying.
The Minister of the Upper Continent, Lord Su, secret name Lin.
The Perfected of the Pure Void, the Heavenly King of the Lesser Existence, surname Wang, secret name Bao.

**The Supreme Red Radiance of the Sun’s Flourishing Pattern**
The secret names of the Five Thearchs within the Sun and Moon and their consorts have already been recorded in the preceding section and will not be repeated here.
The Supreme August Highest Perfected Dao Lord of the Red Qi within the Sun.
The August Divine Mother of the Yellow Qi within the Moon.

**The Supreme Eightfold Wisdom’s Hidden Writ of the Divine Tiger for Annihilating Demons**
The Heavenly Thearch Lord of the Supreme Tenuity, name [missing], styled Shanyuan.
The Great Demon of the Six Heavens, inner name Pigan Duwang.
The Demon King of the Northern Thearch, hidden secret name Zhenshi Luo[?].
The Demon Ministers of the Northern Feng, soul name Four Heavenly [?].

**The Jade Record of the Eight Radiant Realms of the Golden Mystery of the Cavern Perfection of the Supreme August Great Dao Lord**
The Supreme August Great Dao Lord of the Highest Clarity, styled Shang Kaiyuan.
The Azure Thearch, named Lu Fengzi.
The Vermilion Thearch of the Central Tenuity, named Ding Wuyan.
The White Thearch of the Purple Tenuity, named Qu Yuanshi.
The Black Thearch of the Mysterious Tenuity, named Qi Yuanxuan.
The Primordial Thearch of the Beginning Tenuity, named Jie Kongzi.
chunks.overlap_context: of the Mysterious and the alignment of hidden origins. She condensed the treasures of the Five Paths, received the womb of the empty void, and took form as a woman. Her countenance ever resembles that of an infant. Above, she wears a dragon-patterned white brocade cloak; below, a white brocade blossom skirt. Upon her head rests a purple radiance hibiscus crown, and at her waist, the Divine Gold tiger talismans. In her left hand, she holds a flowing-gold fire bell; in her right, the *Scripture*.

chunks.original_text: 灵微中帝名秉尼文。 宣微下帝名蜜肤子。 洞微真帝名泗澄摅。 九微内帝名申明闲。 太微琅玕华丹上法宝妙略 青童君讳梵湄，八节日存之。 洞真疏略 右卷中有诸高真上圣、女真、洞宫主职仙真名讳，或备或略，并已在《登真隐诀》卷中具载，此不复重出。 又洞真疏略 上清真人总仙大司马长生法师主三天君，姓□成，名欻生，字芝高。 上清高圣太上大道君。 上清金阙帝君，姓李，讳弘元，字山渊。 青要帝君。 太元真人，姓茅，讳盈，字叔申。 清灵真人裴君，字玄仁。 玄洲上卿，姓苏，讳林，字子玄。 紫阳真人，姓周，字义山。 清虚真人，姓王，讳褒，字子登。 南岳夫人，姓魏，讳华存，字贤安。 回元九道飞行羽经 九晨真人日行飞步之道，当思九星中夫人名讳。 第一天枢星，号魁精玄上真皇夫人，姓碧烂，讳琼瓮艽，头作飞云华颓之髻，余发散至腰，衣紫黄青锦三色之，带九铃之绶，口常吐青气之光，以注於阳明星上，以明星之焕也。 第二天璇星，则阴精星之魂神也。 其星则号灵精上玄皇夫人，姓大晖，上讳流晖艽，头作飞云华颓之髻，余发散至腰，衣飞锦罗罗，凤文锦帔，带灵飞紫绶，口常吐黑气之光，以注於阴精星上，以明星之晖也。 第三天玑星，则真人星之魄精也。 其星则号灵妃元皇夫人，姓元洞精，讳明云征，头建晨婴宝冠，衣飞云明光锦，带火山飞是之绶，口常吐黄气之精，以玄注真人星上，以明星之晖也。 第四天权星，则玄冥星之魄精也。 其星则号上灵神妃华皇夫人，姓安玄，讳九曜津，头建七称之冠，衣腓罗凤文之，带金真玉光之章，口常吐赤气之精，以注玄冥星上，以明星之焕晖也。 第五玉衡星，则丹元星之魄灵也。 其星则号北上金盖中皇夫人，姓促无，讳运珠，头建紫晨飞华之冠，衣九色之，带神虎玉文，口常吐白气之精，以注丹元星上，以明星之曜晖也。 第六闿阳星，则北极星之魄灵也。 其星则号安上晨华元皇夫人，姓幽光，讳无灵究，头建玉晨进贤之冠，衣飞青羽，带流金火铃，口常吐绿气之精，以注北极星上，以明星之曜晖也。 第七瑶光星，则天关星之魂大明也。 其星则号玉华灵皇夫人，姓天明真，讳上归来，头建飞云华颓之髻，余发散至腰，衣七色夜光云锦之，九色锦帔，带九天威灵玉策，口常吐赤气之精，注於天关星上，以明星之大光也。 第八洞明星，则辅星之魂精阳明也。 其星则号太明常皇夫人，姓广芒，讳长庚曜，头作飞云华颓之髻，余发散至腰，衣飞罗文，带九光之绶，口常吐青气之精，以注於辅星之上，以明星之大光也。 第九隐元星，则弼星之魂明空灵也。 其星则隐息华盖之下，号空玄变灵上皇夫人，姓幽虚，讳大华伏，头建飞天七称玉冠，衣青文锦，带九光夜烛，口常吐黑气之精，以注於弼星之上，以明焕隐洞之光也。 阳明星，天之太尉，司政主非。 上有青城玉楼据斗真人，号曰九晨君，姓上云，讳据上明，头建九晨玉冠，衣青羽飞裳，手执斗中玄图，坐玉楼之上。 阴精星，天之上宰，主禄，上总天宿，下领万灵，星有五门，门有四光芒爓，照九亿万里中，上有五色玉楼攀魁真人，号曰北上晨君，姓育婴，讳隐明光，头建玄精玉冠，衣玄羽飞裳，手执五色羽节，坐玉楼之中。
chunks.translated_text:
**The Jade Record of the Eight Radiant Realms of the Golden Mystery of the Cavern Perfection of the Supreme August Great Dao Lord (continued)**

The Central Thearch of the Numinous Tenuity, named Bing Niwen.
The Lower Thearch of the Proclaiming Tenuity, named Mi Fuzi.
The True Thearch of the Cavern Tenuity, named Si Chengshu.
The Inner Thearch of the Ninefold Tenuity, named Shen Mingxian.

**The Wondrous Essentials of the Supreme Dharma Treasures of the Jade Orchid of the Grand Tenuity**

The Blue Lad, hidden name Fan Mei, to be visualized on the eight solar terms.

**Excerpts from the *Compendium of Cavern Perfection***

The preceding scroll contains the names and hidden appellations of the various High Perfected, Supreme Sages, Female Perfected, and Cavern Palace Masters—some recorded in full, others in brief—all of which are already fully documented in the *Concealed Instructions for Ascending Perfection*; thus, they are not repeated here.

**Further Excerpts from the *Compendium of Cavern Perfection***

The Supreme Clarity Perfected, Grand Marshal of the Celestial Hosts and Master of Longevity, Governor of the Three Heavens, surnamed [missing] Cheng, named Xusheng, styled Zhigao.

The Supreme August Great Dao Lord of the Highest Clarity.
The Golden Watchtower Thearch of the Highest Clarity, surnamed Li, hidden name Hongyuan, styled Shanyuan.
The Azure Essence Thearch.
The Grand Tenuity Perfected, surnamed Mao, hidden name Ying, styled Shushen.
The Pure Numinosity Perfected, Lord Pei, styled Xuanren.
The Upper Minister of the Mysterious Continent, surnamed Su, hidden name Lin, styled Zixuan.
The Purple Yang Perfected, surnamed Zhou, styled Yishan.
The Pure Emptiness Perfected, surnamed Wang, hidden name Bao, styled Zideng.
The Lady of the Southern Marchmount, surnamed Wei, hidden name Huacun, styled Xian’an.

**The Ninefold Way of Soaring Flight of the Returning Primordial Feathered Scripture**

The Way of the Nine Morning Perfected for daily astral traversal requires contemplation of the names and hidden appellations of the Nine Starry Ladies.

The First, the Celestial Pivot Star, is titled the August Radiant Lady of the Mysterious Prime, the Sovereign of the Upper Perfected, surnamed Bilan, hidden name Qiongwengjiao. Her hair is bound in a soaring-cloud floral chignon, the rest cascading to her waist. She wears a three-hued robe of purple, yellow, and azure brocade, girded with a nine-belled sash. Her mouth perpetually exhales a luminous azure qi, which she directs upon the Yang Brightness Star to illumine its splendor.

The Second, the Celestial Rotator Star, is the spirit-soul of the Yin Essence Star. This star is titled the August Radiant Lady of the Numinous Essence, surnamed Dahui, upper hidden name Liuhuijiao. Her hair is bound in a soaring-cloud floral chignon, the rest cascading to her waist. She wears a flying brocade robe of layered gauze, draped with a phoenix-patterned mantle, and girded with a numinous flying purple sash. Her mouth perpetually exhales a luminous black qi, which she directs upon the Yin Essence Star to illumine its radiance.

The Third, the Celestial Jade Star, is the corporeal essence of the Perfected Person Star. This star is titled the August Primordial Lady of the Numinous Consort, surnamed Yuan Dongjing, hidden name Ming Yunzheng. She wears a morning-infant treasure crown and a flying-cloud luminous brocade robe, girded with a fireside flying-sun sash. Her mouth perpetually exhales a yellow essence of qi, which she mystically directs upon the Perfected Person Star to illumine its radiance.

The Fourth, the Celestial Balance Star, is the corporeal essence of the Mysterious Darkness Star. This star is titled the August Radiant Lady of the Divine Consort, surnamed Anxuan, hidden name Jiuyaojin. She wears a seven-tiered crown and a phoenix-patterned robe of fine gauze, girded with a golden true jade-luminous seal. Her mouth perpetually exhales a red essence of qi, which she directs upon the Mysterious Darkness Star to illumine its brilliance.

The Fifth, the Jade Balance Star, is the corporeal spirit of the Cinnabar Prime Star. This star is titled the August Central Lady of the Golden Canopy of the Northern Upper Realm, surnamed Cuwu, hidden name Yunzhu. She wears a purple morning flying-floral crown and a nine-hued robe, girded with a divine tiger jade-patterned sash. Her mouth perpetually exhales a white essence of qi, which she directs upon the Cinnabar Prime Star to illumine its luminous radiance.

The Sixth, the Celestial Yang Star, is the corporeal spirit of the Northern Culmen Star. This star is titled the August Primordial Lady of the Morning Floral Peace, surnamed Youguang, hidden name Wulingjiu. She wears a jade morning advancing-worthy crown and a flying azure feathered robe, girded with a flowing-gold fire-belled sash. Her mouth perpetually exhales a green essence of qi, which she directs upon the Northern Culmen Star to illumine its luminous radiance.

The Seventh, the Jade Radiance Star, is the great luminosity of the Celestial Pass Star. This star is titled the August Radiant Lady of the Jade Floral Numinosity, surnamed Tianmingzhen, hidden name Shangguilai. Her hair is bound in a soaring-cloud floral chignon, the rest cascading to her waist. She wears a seven-hued night-luminous cloud brocade robe and a nine-hued brocade mantle, girded with a nine-heavenly might jade tally. Her mouth perpetually exhales a red essence of qi, which she directs upon the Celestial Pass Star to illumine its great light.

The Eighth, the Cavern Brightness Star, is the yang luminous essence of the Auxiliary Star. This star is titled the August Constant Lady of the Grand Brightness, surnamed Guangmang, hidden name Changgengyao. Her hair is bound in a soaring-cloud floral chignon, the rest cascading to her waist. She wears a flying gauze-patterned robe, girded with a nine-luminous sash. Her mouth perpetually exhales a blue essence of qi, which she directs upon the Auxiliary Star to illumine its great light.

The Ninth, the Hidden Primordial Star, is the luminous empty numinosity of the Adjuvant Star. This star conceals itself beneath the Floral Canopy, titled the August Upper Lady of the Empty Mysterious Transformation, surnamed Youxu, hidden name Dahuafu. She wears a seven-tiered jade flying-heaven crown and a blue-patterned brocade robe, girded with a nine-luminous night-candle sash. Her mouth perpetually exhales a black essence of qi, which she directs upon the Adjuvant Star to illumine the hidden brilliance of the Cavern Light.

The Yang Brightness Star is the Celestial Grand Commandant, governing transgressions and overseeing judgments. Above it resides the Perfected of the Dipper-Holding Jade Tower of the Azure City, titled the Nine Morning Lord, surnamed Shangyun, hidden name Jushangming. He wears a nine-morning jade crown and a flying azure feathered robe, holds the Mysterious Chart of the Dipper, and sits upon the Jade Tower.

The Yin Essence Star is the Celestial Grand Steward, governing emoluments, overseeing the celestial lodgings above, and commanding the myriad spirits below. The star possesses five gates, each with four radiant beams that illuminate nine hundred million myriad li. Above it resides the Perfected of the Five-Hued Jade Tower Clutching the Dipper, titled the Northern Upper Morning Lord, surnamed Yuying, hidden name Yinmingguang. He wears a dark essence jade crown and a dark feathered flying robe, holds a five-hued feathered tally, and sits within the Jade Tower.

The Supreme August Great Dao Lord of the Highest Clarity, styled Shang Kaiyuan.
The Azure Thearch, named Lu Fengzi.
The Vermilion Thearch of the Central Tenuity, named Ding Wuyan.
The White Thearch of the Purple Tenuity, named Qu Yuanshi.

chunks.original_text: 真人星，天之司空，主神仙，星围七百七十里，有十二门，门有四光芒爓，照九亿万里中。 上有黄台玉楼真人，号曰主仙华晨君，姓归，讳通勃光，头建飞晨宝冠，衣青羽飞裳，手执斗中青箓，坐玉楼之中。 玄冥星，天之游击，主伐逆，上总九天鬼神，中领北帝三官，下临监万兆，伐逆不臣，诸以凶勃，莫不隶焉，星围八百里，有三门，门有四光芒焖，照九亿万里中。 上有朱台玉楼步斗真人，号曰玄上飞盖晨君，姓冥枢，讳冥巡光，头建三华宝晨冠，衣丹锦飞裳，手执命灵之节，坐玉楼之中。 丹元星，天之斗君，主命录籍，上总九天，星围七百二十里，有七门，门有四光爓，照九亿万里中。 上有素台金楼蹑纪真人，号曰金刚七晨君，姓上开，讳明曜精，头建七宝飞天冠，衣白锦飞裙，手执青元录籍，坐金楼之中。 北极星，天之太常，主升进，上总九天，星围七百七十里，有八门，门有四光芒爓，照九亿万里中。 上有玄台玉楼步纲真人，号曰北晨飞华君，姓明灵，讳幽关元，头建飞精华冠，衣紫锦飞裳，手执九斗玉策，坐于玉楼之中。 天关星，天之上帝，主天地机运，星围九百里，有一门，门有九光芒，总运九天之气爓，照九亿万里中。 上有九层玉楼乘龙真人，号曰总灵九元北盖晨君，姓玄枢，讳巡七，头建九元宝冠，衣九色锦裳，手执晖神之章，坐玉楼之中。 辅星，天尊玉帝之星也。 曰常，常者常阳，主飞仙，上总九天，星围九百九十里，有八门交通八气，门有四光芒爓，照九天之上。 中有紫气玉楼游行三命真人，号曰帝尊九晨君，姓精常，讳精灵觉，头建飞精玉冠，衣九凤衣，手执火铃，坐玉楼之中。 弼星，太帝真星也。 曰空，空者常空隐也，主变化无方，星围九百九十里，有九门交关九天，门有四光芒爓，照八极之外，无央之中也。 中有玉台紫馆徘徊三阳真人，号曰帝真元晨君，姓幽空，讳变空轮，头建飞天玉冠，衣九天龙衣，手执帝章，坐于紫馆之中。 步空常法 西方皓帝少阳明皇，讳金上精。 中央元皇五帝隐名，号曰步常门。 南方赤皇五帝明灵，讳游光曜。 东方青晨玄上君，讳太明。 北方太皇五帝尊，讳阴元煞。 上清众经诸真圣秘卷之七竟 上清众经诸真圣秘卷之八
chunks.translated_text:
The Perfected Star is the Celestial Minister of Works, governing immortals and transcendents. The star spans seven hundred seventy li, with twelve gates, each possessing four radiant beams that illuminate nine hundred million myriad li. Above it resides the Perfected of the Yellow Terrace Jade Tower, titled the Lord of Immortal Florescence Morning Lord, surnamed Guixi, hidden name Tongboliang. He wears a flying morning treasure crown and a flying azure feathered robe, holds the Azure Register of the Dipper, and sits within the Jade Tower.

The Dark Depths Star is the Celestial Vanguard, governing the punishment of rebels. It commands the ghostly spirits of the Nine Heavens above, oversees the Three Officials of the Northern Emperor at the center, and monitors the myriad multitudes below, punishing rebellion and disobedience. All who act with violent audacity fall under its jurisdiction. The star spans eight hundred li, with three gates, each possessing four radiant beams that illuminate nine hundred million myriad li. Above it resides the Perfected of the Vermilion Terrace Jade Tower Treading the Dipper, titled the Dark Upper Flying Canopy Morning Lord, surnamed Mingshu, hidden name Mingxunliang. He wears a three-florescence treasure morning crown and a flying cinnabar brocade robe, holds the tally of life and numen, and sits within the Jade Tower.

The Cinnabar Prime Star is the Dipper Lord of Heaven, governing the registers of destiny. It commands the Nine Heavens above. The star spans seven hundred twenty li, with seven gates, each possessing four radiant beams that illuminate nine hundred million myriad li. Above it resides the Perfected of the Plain Terrace Golden Tower Treading the Records, titled the Vajra Seven Morning Lord, surnamed Shangkai, hidden name Mingyaojing. He wears a seven-treasure flying celestial crown and a flying white brocade skirt, holds the Azure Prime Register, and sits within the Golden Tower.

The Northern Culmen Star is the Celestial Grand Master of Ceremonies, governing advancement and promotion. It commands the Nine Heavens above. The star spans seven hundred seventy li, with eight gates, each possessing four radiant beams that illuminate nine hundred million myriad li. Above it resides the Perfected of the Dark Terrace Jade Tower Treading the Net, titled the Northern Morning Flying Florescence Lord, surnamed Mingling, hidden name Youguanyuan. He wears a flying essence florescence crown and a flying purple brocade robe, holds the nine-dipper jade tally, and sits within the Jade Tower.

The Celestial Pivot Star is the Celestial Supreme Emperor, governing the mechanisms of Heaven and Earth. The star spans nine hundred li, with one gate possessing nine radiant beams that govern the qi-florescence of the Nine Heavens, illuminating nine hundred million myriad li. Above it resides the Perfected of the Nine-Layered Jade Tower Riding the Dragon, titled the All-Numen Nine Prime Northern Canopy Morning Lord, surnamed Xuanxu, hidden name Xunqi. He wears a nine-prime treasure crown and a nine-colored brocade robe, holds the luminous numen’s seal, and sits within the Jade Tower.

The Assistant Star is the star of the Heavenly Venerable Jade Emperor. It is called *Chang* (Eternal), for it is the Eternal Yang, governing flying immortals. It commands the Nine Heavens above. The star spans nine hundred ninety li, with eight gates interconnecting the eight qi, each possessing four radiant beams that illuminate the upper reaches of the Nine Heavens. Within it resides the Perfected of the Purple Qi Jade Tower Roaming the Three Destinies, titled the Imperial Venerable Nine Morning Lord, surnamed Jingchang, hidden name Jinglingjue. He wears a flying essence jade crown and a nine-phoenix robe, holds a fire bell, and sits within the Jade Tower.

The Adjuvant Star is the true star of the Supreme Emperor. It is called *Kong* (Void), for it is the Eternal Hidden Void, governing boundless transformations. The star spans nine hundred ninety li, with nine gates interconnecting the Nine Heavens, each possessing four radiant beams that illuminate beyond the Eight Extremities into the endless center. Within it resides the Perfected of the Jade Terrace Purple Palace Wandering the Three Yangs, titled the Imperial True Prime Morning Lord, surnamed Youkong, hidden name Biankonglun. He wears a flying celestial jade crown and a nine-heaven dragon robe, holds the imperial seal, and sits within the Purple Palace.

**Method of Treading the Void and Eternal**
The White Emperor of the West, Lesser Yang Bright Sovereign, hidden name Jinshangjing.
The Hidden Name of the Central Prime Sovereign of the Five Emperors, titled the Gate of Treading the Eternal.
The Vermilion Sovereign of the South, Five Emperors Bright Numen, hidden name Youguangyao.
The Dark Upper Lord of the East, Azure Morning, hidden name Taiming.
The Supreme Sovereign of the North, Five Emperors Venerable, hidden name Yinyuansha.

*Concluded is the Seventh Scroll of the Esoteric Scriptures of the Perfected and Sages of the Highest Clarity*
*Begins the Eighth Scroll of the Esoteric Scriptures of the Perfected and Sages of the Highest Clarity*

The star possesses five gates, each with four radiant beams that illuminate nine hundred million myriad li. Above it resides the Perfected of the Five-Hued Jade Tower Clutching the Dipper, titled the Northern Upper Morning Lord, surnamed Yuying, hidden name Yinmingguang. He wears a dark essence jade crown and a dark feathered flying robe, holds a five-hued feathered tally, and sits within the Jade Tower.

chunks.original_text: 天枢星元斗宫中魁精玄上真皇夫人，姓明通，讳婴育，真名 天璇星玄魁宫中灵精上玄皇夫人，姓玄镜，讳郁勃光，真名 天玑星上清宫中灵妃元皇夫人，姓常明，讳化云，真名 天权星纲极宫中上灵神妃华皇夫人，姓开生，讳运明，真名 玉衡星灵关宫中北上金盖中皇夫人，姓元方，讳神武，真名 闿阳星紫极宫中安上晨华元皇夫人，姓玉元，讳华根，真名 瑶光星运天宫中玉华灵皇夫人，姓庆元，讳终会，真名 洞明星空真宫中帝大明常皇夫人，姓幽升，讳元韵，真名 隐元星常宝宫中空玄变灵一上皇天人，姓冥通，讳万光，真名 右属中天北斗九星之魂精，九皇夫人之至名，变化之威神，人能知者不死，修之飞仙矣。 辅星帝席宫紫气玉楼帝尊九晨君，姓精常，讳常无瓮，字玄解子，真名 弼星上尊宫玉楼紫馆帝尊九晨君，姓幽空，讳空无先，字隐元觉，真名 右辅弼二星神，则天地魂魄之威神，辅星主天，曰常； 弼星主地，曰空。 阳明星太上宫青城玉楼九晨君，姓上灵，讳法婴容，字熏洞阳，真名 阴精星中元宫五色玉楼北上晨君，姓育婴，讳玄上瓮，字昌阳文，真名 真人星真元宫黄台玉楼主仙华晨君，姓归，讳妙音光，字通度元，真名 玄冥星纽幽宫朱台玉楼玄上飞盖晨君，姓冥枢，讳定宣觉，字法闻度，真名 丹元星纲神宫素台金楼金魁七晨君姓上开，讳冥通光，字朱焕元，真名 北极星纪明宫玄台玉楼北晨飞华君姓明灵，讳长明化，字洲洞源，真名 天关星关会宫九层玉楼总灵元真比盖晨君，姓玄枢，讳转天光，字会夫终，真名 右七星神，皆九精帝晨，九天之威神，治于北斗七星宫馆之中。 太上宫中帝君变隐桃元内妃，姓延明，讳太一法坦，字幸正扶，真名 中元宫中帝君宝胎化形内嫔，姓开关，讳太一三来瓮，字罗朱婴，真名 真元宫中帝君六遁七隐上元丹母，姓溟蒙，讳太一灵夷，字冲双兆，真名 纽幽宫中帝君匿景藏光中元内妃，姓开耀，讳太一七烈，字横单盘，真名 纲神宫中帝君变体易景斗中大女，姓玄路，讳太一郁书，字畴丘兰，真名 纪明宫中帝君隐连散象斗中中女，姓棐廉，讳太一气精，字抱定陵，真名 关会宫中帝君分景万形斗中少女，姓瓮重，讳太一郁墨，字天凡婌，真名 帝席宫中帝君化日月水火斗中高皇左夫人，姓常明，讳太一石启珠，字络茂华，真名 上尊宫中帝君化金石山河斗中高皇右夫人，姓空黄，讳太一爱修，字云育玄，真名 右帝君九晨斗宫中隐妃，九阴之大神。 东方岁星阳元宫中真皇帝君，姓碧空，讳澄澜，字清凝，真名 南方荧惑星洞阳宫中真皇君，姓焕空，讳维渟，字散融，真名 西方太白星素明宫中真皇君，姓浩空，讳寥凌，字振寻，真名 北方辰星玄斗宫中真皇君，姓阴空，讳肇咺，字精源，真名 中央镇星上柜宫中真皇君，姓常空，讳藏睦，字耽延，真名 右属五方五星宫中五真皇君隐名，太上藏之紫房九灵上宫。 东方阳元宫中真皇帝君皇夫人，姓开常，讳宝容，字飞云，真名 南方洞阳宫中真皇帝君皇夫人，姓阳常，讳华瓶，字玄罗，真名 西方素明宫中真皇帝君皇夫人，姓明常，讳飙英，字灵思，真名 北方玄斗宫中真皇帝君皇夫人，姓渊常，讳玄华，字龙娥，真名 中央上枢宫中真皇帝君皇夫人，姓康常，讳空瑶，字飞贤，真名

chunks.original_text: 右五方五星帝君五皇夫人内阴隐名，太上藏之玄斗紫盖宫中。 金星五点 金星第一点，姓地九常，讳婴育，字通勃，真名逃九元。 金星第二点，姓育常，讳焕通，字幽元，真名入五道。 金星第三点，姓卯常，讳金生，字浩渟，真名代六形。 金星第四点，姓流常，讳谷清，字逃迹，真名转三关。 金星第五点，姓行常，讳浩逃，字去斗，真名服黑精。 右西方太白星五常，并建素梁宝冠，衣素锦飞衣，手执金符玉节，主七门变化。 土星五点 土星第一点，姓上常，讳黄光，字元胤，真名逃皇元。 土星第二点，姓天常，讳寥雷，字卓度，真名入木精。 土星第三点，姓名常，讳空祯，字霞玄，真名变水火。 土星第四点，姓三常，讳滕旻，字灵变，真名金上生。 土星第五点，姓辰常，讳内溢，字益征，真名黑来谷。 右中央镇星五常。 并建黄粱宝冠，衣黄锦飞衣，手执黄麾之章，主十二门变化。 火星五点 火星第一点，姓空常，讳常阳，字元无，真名灵通冥。 火星第二点，姓河常，讳流精，字七转，真名七会神。 火星第三点，姓元常，讳南皓，字精极，真名入流光。 火星第四点，姓古常，讳洞生，字征通，真名变三神。 火星第五点，姓巳常，讳季行，字后化，真名逃形迹。 右南方荧惑星五常，并建朱梁宝冠，衣朱锦飞衣，手执赤神命灵之章，主三门变化。 木星五点 木星第一点，姓九常，讳青芒，字上阳，真名隐真身。 木星第二点，姓世常，讳苍元，字长命，真名通九道。 木星第三点，姓明常，讳碧渊，字洞生，真名化青光。 木星第四点，姓玉常，讳归青，字玉阳，真名流电冲。 木星第五点，姓法常，讳绿台，字明暧，真名万真会。 右东方岁星五常，并建青梁宝冠，衣青锦飞衣，手执青帝制魔之章，主九门变化。 水星五点 水星第一点，姓阴常，讳玄通，字子元，真名北上元。 水星第二点，姓黄常，讳日空，字冬冥，真名动天众。 水星第三点，姓定常，讳隐阳，字勃光，真名轮大。 水星第四点，姓飞常，讳上元，字藏光，真名定万神。 水星第五点，姓六常，讳终变，字分图，真名入黑关。 右北方辰星五常，并建玄梁宝冠，衣玄锦飞衣，手执北宫摄杀之麾，主五门变化。 存斗中法 斗中大神，名曰奇钮厥，字灵纲，每月一日、三日、五日存之。 又每月七日、九日、十三日，禺中夜半时，存见斗中大神，名璇度，字素康，入心中。 又每月十五日、十九日、二十三日，禺中夜半时，入空室正坐，接手定气，临目毕，乃自存见北斗九星，来下入脐下三寸下元宫，以斗柄杓坚仰，向心魁中，向外极久，忽见魁中有一大神，名曰杭萌厥，字流郁。 酆都鬼帝秘录 酆都第一宫，名纣绝阴天宫，炎帝庆甲为鬼宫大帝，北帝君所治，总领六宫，夏启为东明公，孙策为宾友。 酆都第二宫，名泰杀谅事宗天宫，周文王为西明公，晋宣王为宾友。 酆都第三宫，名明晨耐犯武城天宫。 酆都第四宫，名恬照罪气天宫，周武王发为鬼官。 酆都第五官，名宗灵七非天宫，邵公奭为南明公，汉高祖为宾友。 酆都第六宫，名敢司连宛屡天宫，吴季札为北明公，晋宣王兼为宾友，纪瞻为修门郎，与虞谭更直一日。 上下文中，有得道人，或为洞天职司，地下主者，俱有名姓，已在《登真隐诀》中具载，不复重出。
chunks.translated_text:
The hidden yin names of the Five August Ladies of the Five Directions and Five Star Emperor Lords are concealed by the Supreme Lord in the Mystic Dipper Purple Canopy Palace.

**Venus (Metal Star) Five Points**
Venus First Point: surname Earth Nine Constant, hidden name Yingyu, style Tongbo, true name Taojiuyuan.
Venus Second Point: surname Nurture Constant, hidden name Huantong, style Youyuan, true name Ruwudao.
Venus Third Point: surname Mao Constant, hidden name Jinsheng, style Haoting, true name Daisixing.
Venus Fourth Point: surname Flow Constant, hidden name Guqing, style Taoji, true name Zhuansanguan.
Venus Fifth Point: surname Walk Constant, hidden name Haotao, style Qudou, true name Fuheijing.
The Five Constants of the Western Venus all wear plain beam precious crowns, plain brocade flying robes, and hold golden talismans and jade tablets, presiding over the transformations of the seven gates.

**Saturn (Earth Star) Five Points**
Saturn First Point: surname Upper Constant, hidden name Huangguang, style Yuanyin, true name Taohuangyuan.
Saturn Second Point: surname Heaven Constant, hidden name Liaolei, style Zhuodu, true name Rumujing.
Saturn Third Point: surname Name Constant, hidden name Kongzhen, style Xiaxuan, true name Bianshuihuo.
Saturn Fourth Point: surname Three Constant, hidden name Tengmin, style Lingbian, true name Jinshangsheng.
Saturn Fifth Point: surname Chen Constant, hidden name Neiyi, style Yizheng, true name Heilaiyu.
The Five Constants of the Central Saturn all wear yellow beam precious crowns, yellow brocade flying robes, and hold the insignia of the yellow banner, presiding over the transformations of the twelve gates.

**Mars (Fire Star) Five Points**
Mars First Point: surname Void Constant, hidden name Changyang, style Yuanwu, true name Lingtongming.
Mars Second Point: surname River Constant, hidden name Liujing, style Qizhuan, true name Qihuishen.
Mars Third Point: surname Origin Constant, hidden name Nanhao, style Jingji, true name Ruliuguang.
Mars Fourth Point: surname Ancient Constant, hidden name Dongsheng, style Zhengtong, true name Biansanshen.
Mars Fifth Point: surname Si Constant, hidden name Jixing, style Houhua, true name Taoxingji.
The Five Constants of the Southern Mars all wear vermilion beam precious crowns, vermilion brocade flying robes, and hold the insignia of the red spirit’s life mandate, presiding over the transformations of the three gates.

**Jupiter (Wood Star) Five Points**
Jupiter First Point: surname Nine Constant, hidden name Qingmang, style Shangyang, true name Yinzhenshen.
Jupiter Second Point: surname World Constant, hidden name Cangyuan, style Changming, true name Tongjiudao.
Jupiter Third Point: surname Bright Constant, hidden name Biyuan, style Dongsheng, true name Huaqingguang.
Jupiter Fourth Point: surname Jade Constant, hidden name Guiqing, style Yuyang, true name Liudianchong.
Jupiter Fifth Point: surname Dharma Constant, hidden name Lütai, style Ming’ai, true name Wanzhenhui.
The Five Constants of the Eastern Jupiter all wear azure beam precious crowns, azure brocade flying robes, and hold the insignia of the Azure Lord’s demon-subduing power, presiding over the transformations of the nine gates.

**Mercury (Water Star) Five Points**
Mercury First Point: surname Yin Constant, hidden name Xuantong, style Ziyuan, true name Beishangyuan.
Mercury Second Point: surname Yellow Constant, hidden name Rikong, style Dongming, true name Dongtianzhong.
Mercury Third Point: surname Steadfast Constant, hidden name Yinyang, style Boguang, true name Lundata.
Mercury Fourth Point: surname Flying Constant, hidden name Shangyuan, style Cangguang, true name Dingwanshen.
Mercury Fifth Point: surname Six Constant, hidden name Zhongbian, style Fentu, true name Ruheiguan.
The Five Constants of the Northern Mercury all wear dark beam precious crowns, dark brocade flying robes, and hold the banner of the Northern Palace’s subduing power, presiding over the transformations of the five gates.

**Method of Visualizing the Dipper’s Center**
The great spirit within the Dipper is named Qiniujue, style Linggang. Visualize him on the first, third, and fifth days of each month.
Additionally, on the seventh, ninth, and thirteenth days of each month, at midnight during the *yu* hour, visualize the great spirit within the Dipper named Xuandu, style Sukang, entering your heart.
Furthermore, on the fifteenth, nineteenth, and twenty-third days of each month, at midnight during the *yu* hour, enter an empty chamber, sit upright, clasp your hands to stabilize your qi, and close your eyes. Then visualize the Nine Stars of the Northern Dipper descending into the Lower Primordial Palace three inches below the navel. With the Dipper’s handle and scoop upright, facing the heart’s *kui* (first star), and directed outward for a long while, suddenly perceive within the *kui* a great spirit named Hangmengjue, style Liuyu.

**Secret Records of the Ghost Emperor of Fengdu**
Fengdu’s First Palace: named the Palace of Zhou’s Absolute Yin, where Yan Emperor Qingjia serves as the Great Ghost Emperor, governed by the Northern Emperor Lord. It oversees the six palaces, with Xia Qi as the Eastern Bright Duke and Sun Ce as the Guest Friend.
Fengdu’s Second Palace: named the Palace of Grand Execution and Faithful Affairs, where King Wen of Zhou serves as the Western Bright Duke and King Xuan of Jin as the Guest Friend.
Fengdu’s Third Palace: named the Palace of Bright Dawn Enduring Offense and Martial City.
Fengdu’s Fourth Palace: named the Palace of Serene Illumination and Sinful Qi, where King Wu of Zhou serves as the Ghost Official.
Fengdu’s Fifth Palace: named the Palace of Ancestral Numinosity and Seven Prohibitions, where the Duke of Shao, Shi, serves as the Southern Bright Duke and Emperor Gaozu of Han as the Guest Friend.
Fengdu’s Sixth Palace: named the Palace of Daring Governance and Continuous Grievances, where Wu Jizha serves as the Northern Bright Duke, King Xuan of Jin concurrently as the Guest Friend, Ji Zhan as the Gatekeeper, and Yu Tan as the alternate attendant for one day.
Among the above, those who have attained the Dao, serve as officials in grotto-heavens, or govern the underworld all have names and surnames, which are fully recorded in the *Dengzhen Yinjue* and will not be repeated here.

chunks.original_text: 八节谢罪法 右法中有五皇夫人真讳，已於《回元九道飞行有经》具载，不复重出。 帝君讳逢凌梵，字履昌灵，一名七灵，一名神丈人，常治太极紫房之中。 真经行事立成要诀上 右此卷中，有存思九星真官夫人名讳第事，与《回元九道飞行羽经》中同，前篇具载，不复重出。 真经行事立成要诀下 两眉间上却入三分，为守寸，左有青房，中有神，着青衣，名正心，字切方； 右有黄阙，中有紫户，紫户中有神，着紫衣，名平静，字法王。 明堂中，左有明童真官，名玄阳，字少青； 中央有明镜神君，名照精，字四明； 右有明女真官，名微阴，字少元。 洞房中，左有太玄紫晨黄阙金室，中有大神，名曰无英； 右有白元君，着黄辰华冠，龙文衣，佩神虎符。 两乳中间黄室，神名黄宁。 上丹田泥丸宫，有赤子玄凝天，字三元先； 右有帝卿，名泽勒精，字中玄生。 中丹田绛官，心中也，方一寸，中元真人，名神运珠，字子南丹； 右有辅卿，名中光坚，字四化灵。 下丹田命门宫，脐下三寸，方一寸，下元婴儿，名始明精，字元阳昌； 右有弼卿，名归上明，字谷下玄。 玄丹宫中紫房绿室，内有太一真君，名规英，字化玄。 日月中有太玄上玄丹灵玉女，名缠旋，字密真。 黄庭内景梁丘子注 心神童子，名真一，亦名赤子，亦名丹子，亦名真人。 发神名苍华，字太元。 脑神名精根，字泥丸。 眼神名明上，字英玄。 鼻神名玉垄，字灵坚。 耳神名空闲，字幽田。 舌神名通命，字正纶。 齿神名崿锋，字罗千。 心神名丹元，字守灵。 肺神名皓华，字虚成。 肝神名龙烟，字含明。 肾神名玄冥，字育婴。 脾神名常在，字魂庭。 胆神名龙曜，字威明。 中部老君名混康，字灵元。 命门宫太一君，名桃孩，字合延。 上清琼宫五帝灵飞六甲内文经 琼宫五帝内真玉名 上清琼宫东极玉真青帝君，讳云拘，字上伯。 上清琼宫南极玉真赤帝君，讳丹容，字洞云。 上清琼宫西极玉真白帝君，讳皓庭，字素罗。 上清琼宫北极玉真黑帝君，讳玄子，字上归。 上清琼宫中极玉真黄帝君，讳文梁，字总元。 上清琼瑶宫灵飞六甲玉女名字 甲子太玄玉女，名灵珠，字承翼。 乙丑玉女，名兰修，字青萌。 丙寅玉女，名定华，字郁陵。 丁卯玉女，名须台，字馥猷。 戊辰玉女，名爱淳，字众梨。 己巳玉女，名四浮，字宁华。 庚午玉女，名会容，字流南。 辛未玉女，名澄华，字抱珠。 壬申玉女，名双皇，字凤文。 癸酉玉女，名龙婴，字欢生。 甲戌黄素玉女，名神元，字非廉。 乙亥玉女，名紫春，字飞芝。 丙子玉女，名奇风，字参盈。 丁丑玉女，名凤环，字郁娥。 戊寅玉女，名淑英，字上容。 己卯玉女，名英玄，字羽珠。 庚辰玉女，名正龄，字香真。 辛巳玉女，名蔚胜，字雕罗。 壬午玉女，名琬瓮，字千成。 癸未玉女，名良营，字娥昌。 甲申太素玉女，名真元，字琼石。 乙酉玉女，名兰萧，字玉英。 丙戌玉女，名娥玄，字和明。 丁亥玉女，名与房，字绿华。 戊子玉女，名翔峰，字定晖。 己丑玉女，名烟童，字偃珠。 庚寅玉女，名七翰，字灵飞。 辛卯玉女，名肇台，字篇敷。 壬辰玉女，名蔚金，字丹旗。 癸巳玉女，名安夫，字沙风。 甲午绛宫玉女，名丹渟，字云龄。
chunks.translated_text:
**Method for Offering Penitence at the Eight Solar Terms**

The true names of the Five August Ladies in this method are already fully recorded in the *Scripture of the Ninefold Return to the Origin and Flying Ascent*, and will not be repeated here.

The Thearch’s name is Feng Lingfan, styled Lüchangling, also called Sevenfold Numinosity, or Divine Elder. He constantly governs within the Purple Chamber of the Great Ultimate.

**Essential Secrets for the Practice and Realization of the True Scripture (Part One)**

The names and ranks of the Nine Stellar True Officials and Ladies in this scroll are identical to those in the *Scripture of the Ninefold Return to the Origin and Flying Ascent with Feathered Wings*, which have been fully recorded in the preceding section and will not be repeated here.

**Essential Secrets for the Practice and Realization of the True Scripture (Part Two)**

Three *fen* above the space between the eyebrows lies the Guard Inch. To the left is the Azure Chamber, within which dwells a spirit clad in azure, named Upright Heart, styled Cutting Square. To the right is the Yellow Gate, within which lies the Purple Portal. Inside the Purple Portal dwells a spirit clad in purple, named Level Stillness, styled Dharma King.

Within the Hall of Light:
- To the left is the Luminous Youthful True Official, named Mysterious Yang, styled Lesser Azure.
- At the center is the Bright Mirror Spirit Lord, named Illuminating Essence, styled Fourfold Clarity.
- To the right is the Luminous Maiden True Official, named Subtle Yin, styled Lesser Origin.

Within the Grotto Chamber:
- To the left is the Great Mysterious Purple Dawn Yellow Gate Golden Chamber, wherein dwells a great spirit named Non-Male.
- To the right is the White Prime Lord, clad in a yellow auroral flowered crown, dragon-patterned robes, and bearing the Divine Tiger Talisman.

Within the Yellow Chamber between the breasts dwells a spirit named Yellow Tranquility.

In the Upper Cinnabar Field of the Muddy Pellet Palace resides the Red Child of Mysterious Congealed Heaven, styled Threefold Origin Prime.
- To the right is the Imperial Minister, named Numinous Leaping Essence, styled Central Mysterious Life.

The Middle Cinnabar Field of the Crimson Palace is the heart, one *cun* square, wherein dwells the Central Origin True Person, named Spirit-Moving Pearl, styled Southern Child Cinnabar.
- To the right is the Assistant Minister, named Central Radiant Firmness, styled Fourfold Transformative Numinosity.

The Lower Cinnabar Field of the Gate of Destiny Palace lies three *cun* below the navel, one *cun* square, wherein dwells the Lower Origin Infant, named Primal Illuminating Essence, styled Origin Yang Prosperity.
- To the right is the Adjutant Minister, named Returning to Supreme Clarity, styled Valley’s Lower Mystery.

Within the Purple Chamber and Green Chamber of the Mysterious Cinnabar Palace dwells the Great One True Lord, named Regulating Hero, styled Transformative Mystery.

Within the sun and moon dwells the Great Mysterious Supreme Cinnabar Numinous Jade Maiden, named Coiling Whirl, styled Secret Truth.

**Commentary on the Inner Radiance of the Yellow Court by Liangqiushizi**

The Heart Spirit Lad is named True One, also called Red Child, Cinnabar Child, or True Person.

The spirit of the hair is named Verdant Florescence, styled Great Origin.
The spirit of the brain is named Essence Root, styled Muddy Pellet.
The spirit of the eyes is named Illuminating Above, styled Heroic Mystery.
The spirit of the nose is named Jade Ridge, styled Numinous Firmness.
The spirit of the ears is named Empty Leisure, styled Secluded Field.
The spirit of the tongue is named Pervading Destiny, styled Upright Thread.
The spirit of the teeth is named Lofty Peak, styled Net Thousand.
The spirit of the heart is named Cinnabar Origin, styled Guardian Numinosity.
The spirit of the lungs is named Luminous Florescence, styled Void Completion.
The spirit of the liver is named Dragon Mist, styled Containing Clarity.
The spirit of the kidneys is named Mysterious Darkness, styled Nurturing Infant.
The spirit of the spleen is named Constant Presence, styled Soul Court.
The spirit of the gallbladder is named Dragon Radiance, styled Majestic Clarity.

The Central Elder Lord is named Primal Harmony, styled Numinous Origin.
The Great One Lord of the Gate of Destiny Palace is named Peach Lad, styled Uniting Longevity.

**Inner Writ of the Six Jia of the Five Numinous Flying Lords of the Jade Palace of Supreme Clarity**

**True Jade Names of the Five Inner Thearchs of the Jade Palace**

Supreme Clarity Jade Palace Eastern Ultimate Jade True Azure Thearch: named Cloud Restrainer, styled Supreme Elder.
Supreme Clarity Jade Palace Southern Ultimate Jade True Vermilion Thearch: named Cinnabar Receptacle, styled Cavern Cloud.
Supreme Clarity Jade Palace Western Ultimate Jade True White Thearch: named Luminous Court, styled Plain Gauze.
Supreme Clarity Jade Palace Northern Ultimate Jade True Black Thearch: named Mysterious Child, styled Supreme Return.
Supreme Clarity Jade Palace Central Ultimate Jade True Yellow Thearch: named Patterned Beam, styled Total Origin.

**Names and Styles of the Jade Maidens of the Six Jia of the Numinous Flying Lords of the Jade Radiance Palace of Supreme Clarity**

chunks.original_text: 乙未玉女，名散阳，字灵华。 丙申玉女，名遂精，字玄珠。 丁酉玉女，名抱云，字绿开。 戊戌玉女，名房宾，字石香。 己亥玉女，名清英，字南灵。 庚子玉女，名灵群，字曲澄。 辛丑玉女，名南姜，字启清。 壬寅玉女，名纷华，字蔚芝。 癸卯玉女，名曜英，字西安。 甲辰拜精宫中玉女，名龙源，字灵素。 乙巳玉女，名欢庭，字逸台。 丙午玉女，名营芝，字玉生。 丁未玉女，名招风，字始娥。 戊申玉女，名夜华，字云婴。 己酉玉女，名密明，字胜非。 庚戌玉女，名紫虚，字容环。 辛亥玉女，名风华，字缘安。 壬子玉女，名仪房，字上音。 癸丑玉女，名宝华，字素明。 甲寅青要宫中玉女，名启元，字慧精。 乙卯玉女，名庆翔，字娥生。 丙辰玉女，名幽昌，字晨晖。 丁巳玉女，名伏华，字广敷。 戊午玉女，名绿云，字安君。 己未玉女，名金声，字曲素。 庚申玉女，名飙游，字云飞。 辛酉玉女，名亲贤，字高英。 壬戌玉女，名神珠，字贯众。 癸亥玉女，名云徊，字抱生。 右上清琼宫灵飞六甲左右玉女内名，具列如前。 上清混化图 右此卷中有诸真讳，与《回元九道飞行羽经》中同，已具载讫，不复重出。 天地宫府真经 中岳真人孟子卓。 中岳真人王仲甫，领署于九玄之司。 少室仙伯北台郎刘千寿。 蓬莱左仙公宋晨生。 蓬莱右仙公贾宝安。 左卿周大宾、姜叔茂。 旸谷神王景林真虞翁生。 西岳卿副司命李仲甫。 真人冯延寿。 仙伯秦叔隐。 八灵道母西岳蒋夫人。 茅山仙人茅初成，讳蒙。 嶓冢山真人左禁郎王道宁。 修行三洞要略 右巷中有斗中九皇帝君，及夫人内妃名讳，与《回元九道飞行羽经》中同，不复重出。 传授七真传九天凤气仪 上皇玉录解二十四内讳 玉清紫虚高上元皇道君，讳程持。 玉清洞虚三元大明上皇道君，讳边赪。 玉清太素高虚上极紫皇道君，讳天。 玉清虚明紫兰中元高上婷皇道君，讳成。 紫清北玄高上虚皇道君，讳爽。 紫清南朱高上虚皇道君，讳盆。 紫清西素高上虚皇道君，讳鸠。 紫清东明高上虚皇道君，讳良。 紫清中元上合虚皇道君，讳腾。 紫清五灵七明混生高上道君，讳京。 高清三元四极玄上虚皇元灵君，讳炫属。 高清三元晨中黄虚皇元台君，讳锵。 高上三元紫映晖神虚生主真元胎君，讳鸳。 上清高圣太上玉晨玄皇大道君，讳荣坐。 上清紫清太素高虚洞曜三元道君，讳萧。 上清紫明太微九道高元玉晨道君，讳便。 上清紫晨太微天帝道君，讳绕类。 上清紫元太微八素三元玄晨元君，讳矜傍。 上清紫微元灵白玉龟台九灵太真元君，讳誉。 上清太虚上霄飞晨中央黄老君，讳阳。 上清太元东霞槫桑丹林太帝上道君，讳仲。 上清太平金阙帝晨后圣玄元上道君，讳强槿。 上清九微太真玉保王金阙上相大司命高晨东海玉明青华小童道君，讳梵湄。 修行上清仪 日月中央有女子，头建紫华芙蓉灵冠，身被朱锦帔裙，自称太玄上玄丹霞玉女，讳缠旋，字密真。 上清众经诸真圣秘卷之八竟

*Upper Clarity Chaos-Transforming Chart*
The various true taboo names in this scroll, identical to those in the *Nine Ways of Returning to the Origin and Flying Feather Scripture*, have already been recorded in full and will not be repeated here.

*True Scripture of the Palaces and Offices of Heaven and Earth*
Central Marchmount True Person Meng Zishuo.

*Essentials of Cultivating the Three Caverns*
The Nine August Emperors of the Dipper and the names and taboo names of their consorts and inner concubines within this scroll are identical to those in the *Nine Ways of Returning to the Origin and Flying Feather Scripture* and will not be repeated here.

*Rites of Transmitting the Seven Perfected and the Nine Heavens’ Phoenix Qi*
*Exegesis of the Jade Record of the Highest August*
Twenty-Four Inner Taboo Names:

Jade Clarity Purple Vacuity Highest August Origin Sovereign Lord of the Dao, whose taboo name is Chengchi.
Jade Clarity Cavernous Vacuity Three Origins Great Illumination Highest August Sovereign Lord of the Dao, whose taboo name is Biancheng.

High Clarity Three Origins Four Poles Mystery High Void August Primordial Numinous Lord, whose taboo name is Xuanshu.
High Clarity Three Origins Morning Central Yellow Void August Primordial Terrace Lord, whose taboo name is Qiang.
Highest Three Origins Purple Radiance Shining Divine Void Birth Master True Origin Womb Lord, whose taboo name is Yuan.
Upper Clarity High Sage Supreme Jade Dawn Mystic August Great Sovereign Lord of the Dao, whose taboo name is Rongzuo.
Upper Clarity Purple Clarity Great Simplicity High Void Cavernous Radiance Three Origins Sovereign Lord of the Dao, whose taboo name is Xiao.

Upper Clarity Supreme Vacuity Upper Empyrean Flying Dawn Central Yellow Elder Lord, whose taboo name is Yang.
Upper Clarity Supreme Origin Eastern Rosy Clouds Mulberry Dawn Vermilion Forest Supreme Emperor Highest Sovereign Lord of the Dao, whose taboo name is Zhong.
Upper Clarity Supreme Peace Golden Watchtower Emperor Dawn Posterior Sage Mystic Origin Supreme Sovereign Lord of the Dao, whose taboo name is Qiangjin.
Upper Clarity Nine Micro Supreme Perfected Jade Guardian King Golden Watchtower Supreme Minister Great Controller of Destinies High Dawn Eastern Sea Jade Brightness Azure Florescence Youth Sovereign Lord of the Dao, whose taboo name is Fanmei.

*Rites of Cultivating the Upper Clarity*
At the center of the sun and moon there is a woman, her head crowned with a purple-flowered hibiscus numinous coronet, her body draped in a vermilion brocade mantle and skirt. She calls herself the Supreme Mystery Upper Mystery Cinnabar Rosy Cloud Jade Maiden, whose taboo name is Chanxuan and styled Secret Perfection.

*Eighth Scroll of the Upper Clarity’s Various Scriptures of the Perfected and Sages’ Secret Rolls* concludes.
